DINNER MENU
Our menu features Neapolitan pizza made with thoughtfully sourced ingredients, including local produce and our house-made dough. Every pie is fired to charred & flimsy perfection in our wood-burning oven ‚Äî right here in Soulard, St. Louis.

TALLOW-FRIED WINGS
Missouri‚Äôs own Buttonwood Farms Chicken Wings are brined in-house and Made-to-order.
(Free Range / Antibiotic-free)
All Sauces Made In House.
MAYFAIR
An homage to St. Louis‚Äô once beloved Mayfair Hotel, this house-made Caesar-style sauce includes wild caught anchovies, fresh lemon juice, and parmigiano reggiano.
These wings are topped with parmigiano reggiano and black pepper and served on a leaf of romaine. Certainly, not for the faint of heart.
ONE POUND | 18
TWO POUNDS | 34
PINEAPPLE HONEY HABANERO
We make this sweet and spicy sauce in-house with a locally-sourced honey & fresh-squeezed pineapple. These wings are topped with green onions.
ONE POUND | 17
TWO POUNDS | 32
SWEET CHILI
This house-made sweet chili sauce boasts a beautiful sweet & savory flavor with a perfect balance of heat & tanginess. These wings are topped with green onion.
ONE POUND | 18
TWO POUNDS | 34
BOURBON BUTTER BBQ
This sweet and smooth house-made bbq sauce is made with grass-fed butter, a bold & citrusy Kentucky bourbon, and simmers for up to eight hours. These wings are topped with green onions.
ONE POUND | 17
TWO POUNDS | 32
BUFFALO
This house-made buffalo sauce includes grass-fed butter which perfectly balances the amount of heat. These wings are topped with green onion and includes our house-made Ranch on the side for dipping.
ONE POUND | 17
TWO POUNDS | 32
SWEET TEA GLAZED

This site uses cookies. By continuing to browse the site, you are agreeing to our use of cookies.

1. Introduction
At Pizzeoli Wood Fired Pizza, we use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our website. This policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can manage your preferences.

2. What Are Cookies?
Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and improve our services.

3. How We Use Cookies
We use the following types of cookies:

Essential Cookies: Necessary for the website to function properly (e.g., keeping items in your cart).

Performance & Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our site (e.g., Google Analytics).

Functional Cookies: Remember your preferences, like language or location settings.

Marketing Cookies: Used to show relevant ads or promotions.

4. Managing Your Cookie Preferences
When you first visit our website, you‚Äôll see a cookie banner allowing you to accept or customize cookie settings. You can change your preferences at any time through our [Cookie Settings] link.

You can also control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.

5. Third-Party Cookies
Some cookies are set by third-party services we use, like social media platforms or analytics providers. We encourage you to review their privacy policies for more details.

6. Updates to This Policy
We may update this policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with a revised "Last Updated" date.

7. Contact Us
If you have any questions about this Cookie Policy, please contact us at:
www.pizzeoli.com/contact
314-449-1111

Cookie and Privacy Settings
How we use cookies
We may request cookies to be set on your device. We use cookies to let us know when you visit our websites, how you interact with us, to enrich your user experience, and to customize your relationship with our website.
Click on the different category headings to find out more. You can also change some of your preferences. Note that blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience on our websites and the services we are able to offer.
Essential Website Cookies
These cookies are strictly necessary to provide you with services available through our website and to use some of its features.
Because these cookies are strictly necessary to deliver the website, refuseing them will have impact how our site functions. You always can block or delete cookies by changing your browser settings and force blocking all cookies on this website. But this will always prompt you to accept/refuse cookies when revisiting our site.
We fully respect if you want to refuse cookies but to avoid asking you again and again kindly allow us to store a cookie for that. You are free to opt out any time or opt in for other cookies to get a better experience. If you refuse cookies we will remove all set cookies in our domain.
We provide you with a list of stored cookies on your computer in our domain so you can check what we stored. Due to security reasons we are not able to show or modify cookies from other domains. You can check these in your browser security settings.
Check to enable permanent hiding of message bar and refuse all cookies if you do not opt in. We need 2 cookies to store this setting. Otherwise you will be prompted again when opening a new browser window or new a tab.
Click to enable/disable essential site cookies.
Google Analytics Cookies
These cookies collect information that is used either in aggregate form to help us understand how our website is being used or how effective our marketing campaigns are, or to help us customize our website and application for you in order to enhance your experience.
If you do not want that we track your visist to our site you can disable tracking in your browser here:
Click to enable/disable Google Analytics tracking.
Other external services
We also use different external services like Google Webfonts, Google Maps,  and external Video providers. Since these providers may collect personal data like your IP address we allow you to block them here. Please be aware that this might heavily reduce the functionality and appearance of our site. Changes will take effect once you reload the page.

name: Gian-Tony's On The Hill
raw_text:
<%@ Language=VBScript %>
<% Option Explicit %>
<%
	Dim strPM, PM, Im1path, Im2path, LogoMain, FSYS, Logo, strMenu, Menu, strMC, MenuCat, strRI, RI, MCols, ID, foldGall, newFolderName, ImgFolder, ImgFiles, file, strMenus, Menus
	
	Response.Expires = 0
	
	strPM = "SELECT * FROM PageMinder WHERE ID = 3"
	
	Set PM = CreateObject("ADODB.RecordSet")
	PM.Open strPM, objConn
	
	strRI = "SELECT * FROM Restaurants"
   
   	Set RI = CreateObject("ADODB.RecordSet")
   	RI.Open strRI, objConn
	
  	
  	If RI("MultipleMenus") = True Then
	  	
	  	strMenus = "SELECT * FROM Menus WHERE Catering = False Order By OrderNo"
	   
	   	Set Menus = CreateObject("ADODB.RecordSet")
	   	Menus.Open strMenus, objConn, adOpenStatic

  		If Request.QueryString("viewMenuID") > "" Then
  			strMenu= "SELECT * FROM Menu WHERE Menu = "& Request.QueryString("viewMenuID") &" Order By OrderNo"
  			strMC = "SELECT MenuCats.ID, MenuCats.MenuCat, First(MenuCats.OrderNo) As OrderNo, First(MenuCats.CatDescrip) AS CatDescrip FROM Menu LEFT JOIN MenuCats ON Menu.MenuCat = MenuCats.ID GROUP BY MenuCats.ID, MenuCats.MenuCat, Menu.Menu HAVING (((Menu.Menu)="& Request.QueryString("viewMenuID") &")) Order By First(MenuCats.OrderNo)"
  		ElseIf Not Menus.EOF Then
  			strMenu= "SELECT * FROM Menu WHERE Menu = "& Menus("ID") &" Order By OrderNo"
  			strMC = "SELECT MenuCats.ID, MenuCats.MenuCat, First(MenuCats.OrderNo) As OrderNo, First(MenuCats.CatDescrip) AS CatDescrip FROM Menu LEFT JOIN MenuCats ON Menu.MenuCat = MenuCats.ID GROUP BY MenuCats.ID, MenuCats.MenuCat, Menu.Menu HAVING (((Menu.Menu)="& Menus("ID") &")) Order By First(MenuCats.OrderNo)"
  		Else
  			strMenu= "SELECT * FROM Menu Order By OrderNo"
  			strMC = "SELECT * FROM MenuCats Order By OrderNo"
  		End If
  	Else
  		strMenu= "SELECT * FROM Menu Order By OrderNo"

	Else

	End If

About the Business
Experience authentic Italian cuisine at Bartolino's Twin Oaks, a cherished St. Louis tradition since 1961. Part of the renowned Bartolino's family, we serve classic Italian dishes, fresh seafood, and premium steaks in a warm, inviting atmosphere. Whether you're joining us for a casual dinner or a special celebration, our team is dedicated to providing exceptional service. Enjoy live music on select nights and discover why generations have made Bartolino's their go-to spot for unforgettable dining. Reservations recommended--visit our website or call today!

Appetizers

Fresh tomatoe, fresh mozzarella cheese and basil over

Artichoke hearts hand-breaded with italian seasoned
breadcrumbs. Served with marinara sauce.

Artichoke hearts sauteed in white wine, lemon, butter, fresh garlic, touch of red pepper and topped with a pinch of breadcrumbs.
Italian Chicken Wings
Marinated with oregano, sage and garlic. Then deep freid and tossed in buffalo sauce. Served with choice of blue cheese or ranch dressing.
Zucchini Sticks
Freshly hand cut zucchini, hand-breaded with italian seasoned breadcrumbs. Served with meat sauce.
Toasted Ravioli
Extra large ravioli, hand-breaded in italian seasoned breadcrumbs and fried. Served with meat sauce.
Shrimp de Jonghe
Large jumbo shrimp lightly breaded and charbroiled in a tangy lemon butter garlic sauce. (substitute in a spicy red tomato sauce ‚Äì per request)
Soups & Salads
Mungo‚Äôs Famous House Salad
Iceberg and romaine lettuce, prosciutto ham, parmesan and
provel cheese. Tossed with our special house creamy italian dressing.
Spinach Salad
Fresh spinach, bacon, mushrooms, parmesan and provel cheese,
and tomatoes. Tossed with our special house creamy italian dressing.
Caprise Salad
Tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, basil, drizzled with extra virgin
olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Andreino‚Äôs Salad
The first salad that owner Tony was taught from his first boss, Andreino DeSantis at Andreino‚Äôs on the Hill.¬†Iceberg and romaine lettuce, artichoke hearts, heart of palms, pimentos, sweet red onions, parmesan cheese, tossed in olive oil and red wine vinegar.

Cream of Broccoli Soup

USDA ground chuck.

Ground chuck burger topped with our well known creamy
provel cheese sauce, mushrooms and green onions.
Mudiga Burger
Ground chuck burger lightly breaded, topped with provel cheese, a white whine lemon butter sauce, prosciutto ham and mushrooms.
Meatball Sub
Homemade meatballs topped with mozzarella cheese.

Broccoli, Baked Potato, Vegetable of the Day, Spaghetti in a Red Meat Sauce or Spaghetti in a Oil Butter Garlic Sauce.

Chicken Tony

sauce, fresh mushrooms and chopped green onions.

Ravioli

Spaghetti noodles in our house made meat sauce. Add meatball and sausage for additional cost.
Pasta 3 Ways

Every entree at The Old Spaghetti Factory is served with hot fresh baked bread, soup or crisp green salad, and a scoop of our signature spumoni or vanilla ice cream. Our menu is full of flavorful value that feels just like home.

AUTHENTIC ITALIAN FOOD FOR DINE IN OR TO GO
At Brio, we believe that to eat well is to live well. We only use the freshest and highest quality ingredients, making sure that every meal is a truly memorable dining experience. Ask your server for the perfect wine or crafted cocktail to compliment our signature Carpaccio with shaved tender beef, capers, and mustard aioli to start your meal. Enjoy an authentic taste of Tuscany with our Spaghetti Bolognese or Pasta Brio. Tuscan inspired Italian restaurant menu is sure to satisfy. Make it a Brio dinner to remember with our double-cut New Zealand Lamb Chops, Grilled Chicken Marsala, or Gorgonzola Crusted Beef Medallions. Whether you‚Äôre enjoying a romantic dinner for two or celebrating a special occasion with family and friends, the Brio dinner menu is the perfect way to indulge in all your favorite Italian dishes.
We‚Äôre open seven days a week, offering lunch & dinner with Brunch on weekends. Reserve your table and
DINE IN
or
ORDER TO GO
for Brio Italian food delivery or curbside pickup. Planning a gathering for 20 or more? Click
GROUP DINING
to get all the details you need to plan your special event, birthday party, family celebration, or corporate event. Want the party delivered? Visit our
CATERING
page for easy ordering for 10 or more. Join us for a great Italian dinner in the restaurant or take out to enjoy at home.
Buon Appetito!

Gluten Free
Pulled Pork Nachos
Freshly made corn tortilla chips generously topped with Applewood smoked hand-pulled pork, housemade cheese sauce, baked beans, and Fitz's Root Beer BBQ Sauce.
Spinach Artichoke Dip
A creamy blend of spinach, artichoke hearts, cream cheese and spices topped with tomatoes and Parmesan cheese, served with grilled pita bread.
Fajita Quesadilla
Warm flour tortilla stuffed with Mozzarella cheese, onions and peppers and YOUR CHOICE of Southwest seasoned chicken breast, marinated NY Strip steak or grilled veggies.
Toasted Ravs
A St. Louis original! Our breaded and toasted large beef raviolis (8) are topped with Parmesan cheese served with housemade marinara dipping sauce.
Wonder Wings
Lightly breaded jumbo chicken wings tossed in our housemade spicy buffalo sauce, served with celery sticks and ranch dressing.
Fitz‚Äôs Pickle Chips
Our bottle cap shaped Kosher pickle chips are lightly breaded in seasoned flour, then flash-fried and served with ranch dressing.
Grilled Steak Kabobs
Marinated NY Strip Steak cubes skewered with red onions, white mushrooms, cherry tomatoes and mixed bell peppers served with creamy horseradish dipping sauce.
Loaded Fries
Fitz's french fries topped with plenty of classic chili, housemade cheese sauce, crumbled Applewood smoked bacon bits, and crispy onion tanglers.
Buffalo Cauliflower
Cauliflower florets lightly dusted in seasoned cornmeal then flash-fried and tossed with our spicy buffalo sauce, served with celery sticks and ranch dressing.
Hummus Platter
Housemade hummus served with fresh red bell peppers, feta cheese, Kalamata olives, sliced cucumbers, celery sticks and grilled pita wedges.
Pretzel Sticks
Oven baked Bavarian style pretzels (4) served with housemade cheese dipping sauce.

Menu
Save Room for Dessert with our
Guilt-Free Fare!
The Fountain on Locust is known for its menu featuring made-from-scratch light fare, including 52 award-winning soups, salads, pasta dishes and sandwiches. Our healthy light fare lets you save room for dessert so that you can indulge without the guilt.
We also offer a multitude of Gluten Free, Vegan, and Vegetarian options! Ask our servers for details or learn more here
.
We update our menu offerings seasonally with new entrees, signature cocktails, mocktails, and desserts.
Follow us on social media or subscribe to our newsletter to find out the latest events and specials.
Award Winning Fare:
Best Soup in St. Louis
(St. Louis Magazine)
Best Ice Cream Parlor in St. Louis
(Fox 2)
Best Ice Cream in Missouri
(MSN)
Top Ice Creams in St. Louis
(Feast Magazine)
Best Place to Impress Out-of-Towners
(Post Dispatch)
Best Place to Bring Family When They Visit
(St. Louis Magazine)
Best Place to Get Engaged in St. Louis
(Riverfront Times)
Best Place to Bring a First Date in St. Louis
(Tinder Guide)
Best Place to Eat on a Budget
(Spoon University)
Allergen Info
If you are using an accessibility reader and have any issues with PDF‚Äôs, scroll down as we work to build out our text menu. Feel free to call us with questions as well at (314) 535-7800.

What Is a Group Order?
Now you can place orders easily with your friends, family, and coworkers.
With group ordering, you can create one order as the host, and then share a link to that order with a group of people. Your guests can then add their choices to the order. Everyone will be able to see the order in real-time. As the host, you can also set a spend limit for your guests.
Once everyone has ordered, it is the host's responsbility to complete the order and make the final payment. The order will then be sent through all at once.

A tap house, wine bar and restaurant located in downtown St. Louis, celebrating artisanal craft beers, wine and seasonal ingredients.
Scroll
carefully curated. artfully plated.
food & beverage menus
our fare.
View Food Menu
Let's rethink standard bar fare.
Whether we're delicately arranging a duck charcuterie board, smoking a NY strip in house, or perfecting a fragrant pomodoro sauce,¬†creativity drives our every step. Enjoy flavorful entrees and snacks perfect for lunch, after-work drinks, dinner or late night gatherings.
Our chefs are proud to offer:
Fresh baked breads
Seasonal ingredients, locally sourced when possible
Build-your-own artisan cheese and charcuterie boards
Desserts made in house
Weekly chef specials
our beverages.
View Drink Menu
Beer and wine lovers, welcome to your home away from home.
At Bridge Tap House, we try for a well-balanced showing of beer and wine from all over the world while also showcasing regional talent. We even have a few offerings brewed exclusively for us by local craft breweries, only available at Bridge. Find something that peaks your interest on our wall of 35+ taps featuring an ever-rotating beer selection...¬†then, order a pint or build your own flight. Found a favorite you can't get enough of? Ask your bartender for a take-home growler or wine bottles to go.
Rotating selection of 35+ draft beers (4, 12, 20, and 64 oz. pours)
50+ beers by the bottle
100+ wines
Featured wine flight every month
Build-your-own beer flight
Tap takeover events (
follow us for updates
)

About us
Welcome to One 19 North
Located in historic downtown Kirkwood, One 19 North Tapas and Wine Bar is a unique dining experience with Spanish influenced tapas creations.
One 19 North Tapas and Wine Bar opened in June of 2010 and is located in the heart of beautiful downtown Kirkwood. Since then, owner Pat Carr and his talented team have been serving quality interpretations of Spanish tapas dishes along with a perfectly a crafted selection of wines to enjoy.
Reserve Today
order & enjoy
your favorites are just a click away
Whether you're short on time or just prefer convenience, online ordering is a great way to get your food from us. It's quick and easy, and your order will be ready for pick-up in no time.
order now
Diverse Menu
something for everyone
Indulge your appetite with our menu of delicious options. From light bites to hearty meals, there's something for everyone. Discover new flavors and satisfying bites with us.

Groups & Parties

With flexible private party spaces and exceptional cuisine, you are sure to have a memorable and enjoyable experience. You and your guests will be impressed by the ambiance and attention to detail, from start to finish.

Review by - GOOGLE
five star review by
Anna C:
One19 is our favorite place for date nights, girls nights and every celebration! We come monthly and have such great experiences every time. The service is great and the food and drink selection always exceeds our expectations. 100% recommended visiting One19 to everyone.
Review by - GOOGLE
five star review by
Daniel P:
Went here for the first time the other night with a group of friends for my wife's birthday. Everything we tried was fantastic! I have been talking about our experience ever since and recommending it to anyone I've talked to. Will definitely be going back!
Review by - GOOGLE
five star review by
Brittany A:
Amazing spot for a dinner date, a few glasses of wine or a night cap. Sat at the bar and had a few drinks with a friend for this visit. Bar tender was attentive and the staff was super nice and accommodating the second I walked in. Appetizer menu is delicious, not one bad thing...
Review by - GOOGLE
five star review by
Francis F:
Went there for our wedding anniversary. Great ambience (we lucked out and got one of the 4 little tables in the 2 front window areas, which added privacy and cut down on noise). The food was delicious, especially the carnitas tacos and the stuffed mushrooms...
Review by - GOOGLE
five star review by
Linda Y:
Though I haven't been yet for dinner, this is my very favorite lunch spot!  Small and, best of all, QUIET, the food is excellent and I have tried many of the appetizers and  sandwiches. Soups are excellent!  Prices are quite reasonable...

Olive + Oak
We set out to create a fun, lively, and approachable restaurant and bar in our own backyard ‚Äî a friendly, bustling neighborhood spot where the very best in food and drink would be served in a welcoming setting. We are looking at every single detail to make sure that Olive + Oak will be the perfect place to enjoy great wine, craft beer, well-made drinks and thoughtful, ingredient driven food with friends and family.
Our philosophy on food is simple. We work tirelessly to source the best ingredients, locally whenever possible. In the kitchen, we use solid, old school cooking techniques.
Whether you‚Äôre coming to see us for a casual night out or for a special occasion, we want to offer you the best of all worlds to accompany your meal. Beer, wine, liquor ‚Äì it‚Äôs all handpicked.
We cook from our hearts and never forget who we are cooking for. YOU. We hope you will dine with us often.

A Dogtown Original
Tucked in the heart of St. Louis‚Äôs historic Dogtown neighborhood, Seamus McDaniel‚Äôs is more than a pub it‚Äôs a tradition. A cozy cornerstone for locals, this family friendly Irish-American spot serves up legendary burgers, ice cold drafts, and a warm welcome that feels like home.

bring the pub to you
Planning a celebration, office lunch, or game day gathering? Let Seamus McDaniel's bring the pub to you. Our catering menu is built for sharing stacked high with crowd-pleasing favorites like crispy wings, garlic cheese bread, and our famous smash burgers.

five star review by
Christina L.:
Prompt service. Ate in the bar area at a high top table. Very comfortable atmosphere. Bar tender was polite and accommodating, checking on me, and other patrons, regularly. Food was so good! Beer was cold!
Review by - google
five star review by
Mark Z.:
One of the best Irish pubs in town, right in the heart of Irish Dogtown. The back patio is fantastic -- a great place to grab a bite or drink on a warm summer day. Super bar as you enter, and a dining area with wooden booths, tables and chairs. The portions are ample and the food is a notch above. Overall this is a very pleasant, authentic Irish pub!
Review by - google
five star review by
Candice K.:
Seamus is always our go to place to take our 3 young kids. They even have newly updated kids menus that have plenty of kid aproved foods and come with drinks! The patio is perfect on a nice day. The buffalo chicken sandwich is gigantic and delicious and the ranch it comes with is worth the price alone- SO good! Their burgers are huge and really good as well. The servers are always nice and attentive and the beers are always cold.

FAQ
Do you have gluten free / vegan options?
We have both. Any whole pie can be made with gluten-free crust or vegan mozzarella.
What about N/A options?
Yes. We keep N/A beers, THC seltzers, and cold brew coffee in stock regularly.
Can my band play there?
No. We have neighbors upstairs. And have you HEARD your band?
My kid loves metal, can I bring them?
Yes, but please keep them under control.
It‚Äôs my birthday and I have 90 friends. Can we take up your entire dining room all night?
We are not a huge space so please contact us first.
Where do I park?
There is usually plenty of street parking available around the building.
Will you turn on the big game, or play a song for me?
No. There are plenty of other places to watch sports, and we don't have a jukebox for a reason.
Do you take reservations?
We are no longer accepting reservations at this time.
Are you handicap accessible?
Yes. There is a ramp on the side of the building, and another inside leading to the bar area. Our bathrooms are handicap accessible as well.
Can I walk in to place a carry out order?
Yes.
Do you have merch?
Yes. We have shirts, stickers, koozies, and more available for purchase.
Can I poop in your bathroom?
NO! Our restrooms are for number 1's only!!

About us
In early November 2010 Bottle Cellars opened it's doors for the first time. It was a small wine shop whose mission was to offer quality and affordable wines in an informative, enjoyable and unique shopping environment. As time went on Bottle Cellars starting expanding it's selection by adding cheese, whiskey, and craft beer to the products it sold. After a few years a small patio was added and we began offering wines by the glass along with simple cheese and charcuterie boards. Everything was going great but after five years in business something became obvious, our customers wanted more... and so did we.
Cellar House
In 2015 we expanded and added a small wine bar we named Cellar House next door to Bottle Cellars. The premise was simple, keep selling the same quality and affordable wines we had been, but offer our customers an appropriate and relaxing place to enjoy them. We also expanded our food menu beyond simple cheese and charcuterie boards to include flatbreads, sliders, and small plates. As time went on the menu at Cellar House began to evolve and we started to notice a change. No longer were our guests coming in for a drink and snack before or after dinner, they were coming in for dinner. Our small wine bar had transformed itself into a restaurant. We were thrilled, and business started to boom. But there was a problem, our kitchen wasn't designed to handle the volume of food we were starting to serve. So after five more years of business it was time to find a new home.
Luckily for us
the search for a new home didn't take us too long or too far away. On June 17th, 2020 Cellar House re-opened in its new home at 5634 Telegraph Road, just one mile north of its original location. With more seating, a larger patio, and a bigger and better equipped kitchen we are excited for what the future holds.

Reviews
Review by - Yelp
Leah L.:
I wish I remembered to take pictures; but I enjoyed my time some much. Great service, loved the food and had a great bottle of Wine.  It was super clean and o love the decor and being able to see the kitchen. We will be going back for sure.
Review by - Google
Sarah B.:
This place is an amazing little spot in Oakville! Friends and I enjoyed our meals, sharing Starters and the dessert. We met the chef who was very nice and gave us some insight on how she plans the menu. The fancy mixed drinks are very unique and work well with the menu! The menu is seasonal and we had the Winter 2023 menu but we'll be back to try the Spring menu in April!
Review by - Yelp
Matthew P.:
Something you would never expect in south county. Exceptional menu which seems to change regularly (if it's on the menu try the poke nachos, wicked good). Service is great, the last two times the bartender has taken care of us. He is attentive, funny, and makes a great drink.
Review by - Google
Meshelle B.:
The food is amazing!! Eclectic, high-end dining, and we WILL be back. I can not say enough good things about our experience. I had the best flatbread. And get the crispy Brussel sprouts. Staff is amazing.  Reservations are highly encouraged.
Review by - Yelp
Tom J.:
This is the place to be in Oakville, which is not saying much, granted.  We especially love the shrimp and grits appetizer and of course the wine list, as the owners started out with a wine shop down the street. The vibe is lively and a bit loud.  A great date spot.
Review by - Google
Kayla S.:
Had the Hazelnut Encrusted Walleye and it was cooked to perfection! They've featured a different fish each night I've been. I've had the salmon, Sea bass, and walleye and they were cooked beautifully! As well as various other items on the menu...
Review by - Yelp
Sharon C.:
Went to Cellar House last nite for our daughter's birthday. It was an exceptional meal , starting with drinks, appetizers entree then dessert.  It's wonderful having a restaurant of this quality in South County at last. Can't wait to go back.
Review by - Google
Chris M.:
Dinner and the experience were very good, and some of the best cocktails I've had in the area.
Review by - Yelp
Tom H.:
We stopped here for a quick bite and cocktail. I had the chicken and dumpling starter and it was fantastic. My wife had the shrimp and grits and it was excellent perfectly cooked. Both dishes were perfectly seasoned. Obviously a very good chef is in charge here.
Review by - Google
Jeff N.:
This is me and my wife's favorite place to eat in STL. It just so happens we also live in Oakville so we come all the time and have never once been disappointed. Can't wait to spend another Valentines Day here...

Our chef-driven menu is a combination of both the modern and classic Mexican kitchen. You‚Äôll experience a menu with inspiration from Baja to Michoacan and everywhere in between. We understand the value that real ingredients bring to the table, that is why we take the time to make our sauces, salsas, marinades, meats and aiolis fresh in-house.
In step with the theme of our kitchen, the beverage program at El Milagro Azteca¬† is also inspired by the old and the new. Our back bar is filled with a curated list of artisan spirits from the US, Mexico, the Caribbean and beyond.
All of our craft cocktails are concocted with housemade syrups, fresh squeezed juices, fresh grown herbs and
Instagram-worthy garnishes.

FOOD ADVISORY*
Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions. We prioritize quality and freshness, serving meals that are prepared with care for you to enjoy confidently.
PRICING*
Like many others, we're experiencing the effects of a changing market. As we carefully adjust our prices, please know that our passion for serving quality food remains as strong as when our family first opened our doors. Your understanding and continued visits to our locations mean the world to us ‚Äì thank you for being part of our story.

Home
About us
Menu
Catering
At Mestiza, we serve the true taste of Mexico with every taco and cantarito. Our menu celebrates authentic Mexican street food, bringing bold, vibrant flavors to St. Louis.
Each taco, from smoky carne asada to zesty al pastor, is crafted with care and packed with legendary Mexican flavor. Don‚Äôt miss our refreshing cantaritos, the perfect pairing for your taco feast, adding an extra punch of flavor to keep the fiesta alive.

The home of your  FAVORITE Margarita!
Our Amigos Tradicional Margarita is a multi-award winning cocktail with countless positive reviews from our guests. Our search for the perfect margarita spanned many years and ingredients and led to the creation of the Tradicional. Each one is hand-shaken with Hornitos Plata Tequila, Cointreau, fresh lime juice and agave nectar. Stop by and try one today, we‚Äôre sure you won‚Äôt be disappointed!
MENUS
FOOD
DRINKS
CATERING
Our Story
Located in the heart of Kirkwood since 2008, our comfortable spot is highlighted by brightly colored wooden shingles out front that are reminiscent of vibrant, colorful Mexican artwork.
Join us for relaxed Mexican-inspired dining with traditional cuisine served in a dining room with warm colors of terra cotta filled with the sounds of salsa music.
Guests can also enjoy our spacious outdoor deck, El Porche, which has a full bar and restaurant service and is the perfect space for any occasion to relax & enjoy our top-rated all-natural house made Margarita!
Let our authentic kitchen staff prepare you a genuine Mexican meal that‚Äôll exceed your expectations and nourish your senses. Amigos Cantina prides itself on our friendly, caring staff and deep family and community connections.¬† Be our guest and our amazing culinary team and our entire Amigos family will treat you to a truly unique dining experience.

About the Business
Our restaurant serves some of the best Mexican food you can find. We originate from Puebla, Mexico and The city of Mexico. We serve fresh food every day and have different special stews as well. We also have refreshing waters every day. And every day they are different! We are best known for our lamb. (Barbacoa.) Come in we are friendly, sit wherever you want and enjoy our family business.

name: Sabroso Cocina Mexicana
address: 11146 Old Saint Charles Rd, Saint Ann, MO 63074
raw_text:
Authentic Mexican Cuisine - Sabroso Cocina Mexicana
Order Now
Home

close
Sabroso Cocina Mexicana
Let Sabroso Cocina Mexicana serve you delicious dishes that are particular to the various
			states of Mexico. Our cocina is your cocina.
Stay updated on promotions and specials!
Contact Us For Catering and Questions
Esquites (Street Corn)
Fresh corn off the Cobb, saut√É¬©ed in garlic and lime mayo topped with queso fresco and chili
				powder
Savor the Flavor of Authentic Mexican Cuisines
When you think of Mexican food, you probably imagine tacos, burritos, and fajitas. But it's
			more than that. Let Sabroso Cocina Mexicana in St. Ann, Missouri serve you delicious dishes
			that are particular to the various states of Mexico. Whether you want to dine in our
			restaurant or take your meal to go, our experienced servers will take care of you. You'll
			surely enjoy a unique dining experience with us!
About Us
Miguel has always had a vision of his own restaurant. He has been cooking since he was about
			ten years old. In Mexico, he learned from working with his mom. She has had a taco stand in
			Mexico City for over 40 years.
When the pandemic led to staffing cuts his friend and mentor made the tough decision to let
			him go but it was a blessing in disguise because he never stopped believing his vision would
			come to life and the time away from the corporate restaurant world gave him the inspiration
			and motivation to perfect his recipes and test the market by serving boxed lunches from his
			home kitchen.
That is how Sabroso was born. A box of business cards and some very loyal customers lead to
			the St Ann location where Miguel and his family and friends worked hard to bring this unique
			dining experience to the community. As always Miguel is planning for the future and we hope to
			bring more locations with more authentic foods to other parts of the St Louis Metro area.
Our Mission
To provide a culinary experience unlike any you've tried before. Education in Mexican culture
		through food.
Testimonials
√¢¬ò¬Ö√¢¬ò¬Ö√¢¬ò¬Ö√¢¬ò¬Ö√¢¬ò
√¢¬Ä¬úGreat first time experience and restaurant! We found this new little neighborhood gem
						while searching for new restaurants in our area. I can say I agree with all of the other
						reviews that have been posted, that encouraged us to try it for the first time. The
						restaurant was clean inside and out. Covid protocols seem to be followed...
...Everything we had tasted delicious and the portion sizes were good. Again, I agree
							with what someone else posted about the mole. I lived 37 years in Southern California,
							and I can tell you that it is authentic. I wish we could've eaten inside, but one of
							us wasn't able to make it to the restaurant so we did a phone order and picke...√¢¬Ä¬ù
- Ramona R.
√¢¬ò¬Ö√¢¬ò¬Ö√¢¬ò¬Ö√¢¬ò¬Ö√¢¬ò
√¢¬Ä¬úThe food was excellent!! We got to sample different meats before we decided what to
						get. The owner was super nice and all the staff were friendly! Can't wait to come back
						and try more things!√¢¬Ä¬ù
- Sarah G.
√¢¬ò¬Ö√¢¬ò¬Ö√¢¬ò¬Ö√¢¬ò¬Ö√¢¬ò
√¢¬Ä¬úThis place is fantastic. With so many chain restaurants going in it was nice finding an
						authentic Mexican restaurant that was quick to order and receive so you had more time to
						savor the food. There were mexican dishes I had never heard of before that I insisted on
						trying and loved every single bite. Chef Miguel obviously has a passion for his craft
						and it shows. The staff were fantastic. I will be back soon.√¢¬Ä¬ù
- Jason

Explore Our
Delicious Offerings
Discover our diverse menu at Kalbi Taco Shack, where we blend the vibrant flavors of Asian Fusion Entrees playing with Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Taiwanese, Vietnamese and American flavors. Each dish is crafted with fresh ingredients, promising a unique and delightful culinary experience for every palate.
We are proud to say we have a complete Nut-Free & MSG-Free Kitchen. We offer Gluten Free, Vegetarian, and Vegan options as well.
Order Online
Menu
MAIN ENTREES
TACOS
Soft Corn or Flour Tortilla
Topped with: Choice of Protein, House made Asian Slaw, House made Kalbi Aioli Sauce and Lime Wedge
BURRITOS
Includes: Choice of Protein, Jasmine Rice, Jack & Cheddar Cheese, Fresh Romaine Lettuce, Sweet Pickled Carrots, Sour Cream and House-made Kalbi Aioli Sauce on 12" Flour Tortilla and Grilled
rice BOWLS
Includes: Choice of Protein, Jasmine Rice, Fresh Romaine Lettuce, Sweet Pickled Carrots¬† and House made Spicy & Sweet Chili Sauce on the Side. Also with an option to top with a Sunny Side-up or Fried Hard Egg
QUESADILLAS
Includes: Choice of Protein in a 12" Folded Flour Tortilla, Jack & Cheddar Cheese and grilled. Sour Cream & House-made Kalbi Aioli Sauce on the side
BRUNCH BURRITO
Includes:¬† Choice of Protein, 2 XLarge scrambled Eggs Jack & Cheddar Cheese, crispy Hash Browns, our spicy & sweet chili sauce and House-made Kalbi Aioli sauce, all rolled up in 12" Tortilla and grilled
PROTEIN BOX
Includes: Choice of Protein on top of Jasmine Rice with a House-made spicy & sweet Chili Sauce on the side and an option to top with a Sunny Side-up or Fried Hard Egg
EACH WITH YOUR CHOICE OF
BONELESS BEEF SHORT RIB
Certified Angus Brand Beef (our signature meat) marinated in our house-made sweet & savory soy sauce marinade.
SWEET & SPICY CHICKEN

54
th
Street Menu
Come and get it!
Jump To Menu Categories
With a large varied menu,54th Street offers something that everyone will enjoy, including tasty made-from-scratch full-sized appetizers, six salad varieties made with fresh cut produce and housemade dressings, fire-grilled mile high burgers, over nine craft sandwich selections, two delicious housemade soups, comfort favorites and much more.
We also offer quick and flavorsome lunch specials for those who are looking for a fulfilling lunch in a time crunch. If you can't make up your mind on a dish, choose one of our signature menu items and feast on the 'Center Cut' Baby Back Ribs, Chicken Madeira, Filet Mignon, hand cut Certified Angus Beef Ribeye,¬† Blackened Atlantic Salmon, Rattlesnake Pasta and much more. Hint, hint...these are our top of the line menu items you won't wont want to miss!
What sets us apart from your typical casual dining restaurant? Other than our fun atmosphere and cool vibe, we are completely family owned. We DO NOT franchise!
OUR MOTTO
"Great food starts with high quality meats and ingredients, fresh produce and meals prepared from scratch. With our amazing range of quality, scratch prepared menu items, we truly have something for everyone. The Five-Four promise is to forever uphold our tradition of serving generous portions of housemade food and drink at an honest price." Sit back, relax and enjoy the 54 Experience.
All of 54th Street's menu items are listed in the left hand menu so find your favorites and let your mouth start watering!

Mexican cuisine is primarily a fusion of indigenous Mesoamerican cooking with European, especially Spanish, elements added after the Spanish conquest of the Aztec Empire in the 16th century. The staples are native foods, such as corn, beans, avocados, tomatoes, and chili peppers, along with rice.

El Potro Mexican Restaurant Menu
El Potro Mexican Restaurant is dedicated to providing the best in authentic Mexican cuisine for the Troy, Illinois area. From chips and salsa to dessert, we have what you crave for lunch, dinner and drinks in our warm and friendly atmosphere. Orders are available for carry out.

Garden Chimichanga
A large Ô¨Çour tortilla with grilled fresh zucchini, carrots, broccoli, mushrooms, onions, bell peppers, and tomatoes, deep fried into a golden brown and topped with cheese dip; served with rice, beans & guacamole salad.
13.99
Chimichanga Mexicana
A large tortilla stuÔ¨Äed qith grilled steak, chicken, shrimp, chorizo, onions, green bell peppers and tomatoes. Deep fried to a golden brown and topped with ranchero sauce, cheese dip and green sauce. Served with rice, beans, lettuce, guacamole, and sour cream.
16.99
Chimichanga Fiestera
A large Ô¨Çour tortilla stuÔ¨Äed with your choice of grilled steak, chicken, or carnitas (pork) deep fried to a golden brown; topped with cheese dip and red sauce, served on a bed of onions, bell peppers, tomatoes, and mushrooms along with rice, beans, and guacamole salad.
15.25
Chimichanga
A large Ô¨Çour tortilla stuÔ¨Äed with your choice of steak, chicken, carnitas (pork) or ground beef, and then deep fried to a golden brown; topped with cheese dip and served with rice, beans, lettuce guacamole, sour cream, and pico de gallo.
13.99
Chimichanga Fajita
A large Ô¨Çour tortilla stuÔ¨Äed with your choice of steak, chicken, or carnitas (pork), grilled onions, bell peppers, and tomatoes, deep fried to a golden brown, topped with cheese dip; served with rice, beans, lettuce, pico de gallo, guacamole and sour cream.
15.75
Seafood Chimichanga
A succulent combination of shrimp, scallops, crab meat, Ô¨Åsh, onions, bell peppers, tomatoes all on the grill, wrapped in a crispy tortilla, topped with cheese dip and served with fresh lettuce, guacamole, pico de gallo, and sour cream, rice & beans.
16.99
Guadalajara
Grilled steak, chicken, broccoli, carrots, zucchini and cauliÔ¨Çower served on a bed of Mexican rice topped with cheese dip.
14.50
Special Dinner - A Little Bit of Everything
One chicken tostada, one beef taco, one tamale, one Chile relleno, and one beef enchilada served with rice and beans.
17.25
Pollo (Chicken)
Pollo Santa Elena
A grilled chicken breast cooked with chorizo, topped with melted cheese: served with rice, beans and lettuce, guacamole, pico de gallo and tortillas.
13.99
Pollo Fiesta
A grilled chicken breast cooked with shrimp, pico de gallo and covered with our special cheese sauce; served with rice, lettuce, guacamole, pico de gallo and three tortillas.
15.50
Pollo Popeye
Grilled chicken strips, onions, mushrooms, and spinach; topped with melted cheese; served with rice, lettuce, guacamole, pico de gallo and tortillas.
12.99
Pollo Ranchero
A grilled chicken breast covered with ranchero sauce; served with rice, beans, lettuce, guacamole, pico de gallo and three tortillas.
12.99
Pollo California
A chicken breast cooked with ham, bacon and pineapple, topped with melted cheese served with fried potatoes and grilled mushrooms.
16.25
Pollo Azteca
A grilled chicken breast topped with grilled onions, mushrooms, bell peppers, tomatoes, and jack cheese; served with rice, beans, lettuce, guacamole, pico de gallo and three tortillas.
13.50
Pollo Chipotle
A grilled chicken breast cooked with onions and covered with a spicy chipotle sauce. Served with rice, black beans, lettuce, guacamole, pico de gallo and tortillas.
12.99
Pollo Primavera
A grilled chicken breast saut√©ed together with carrots, broccoli and cauliÔ¨Çower, served with rice, lettuce, guacamole, pico de gallo and a side order of cheese dip.
13.50
Arroz con Pollo
A grilled chicken breast served on a bed of Mexican rice; topped with cheese dip.
11.50
Steaks
Carne Asada
Two thin grilled rib eye steaks; served with rice, refried beans, lettuce, avocado, pico de gallo, grilled jalape√±o, green onion & tortillas.
16.99
Bistec and Camarones (Steak and Shrimp)
8oz rib eye steak and grilled shrimp served on a skillet plate with bed of onions, bell peppers, tomatoes and mushrooms; covered with shredded cheese; served with rice, beans, lettuce, guacamole, pico de gallo and tortillaa.
18.99
Parrillada (For 2)
A grilled FEAST! 8oz Grilled ribeye steak, chicken breast, smoked pork chop, shrimp, chorizo, carnitas, nopales (cactus), green onions, Chile toreado (grilled jalapeno pepper) and fresh cheese. Served with rice, beans, guacamole salad and tortillas.
39.99
El Compa Special
Grilled shrimp and steak strips with sliced jalapeno peppers, zucchini, and squash; topped with melted cheese served with rice, black beans, lettuce, guacamole, pico de gallo and tortillas.
17.70
Carne a la Mexicana
Two tender thin slices of ribeye steak served on a bed grilled with onions, tomatoes & jalapenos; served with rice, black beans, lettuce, guacamole, pico de gallo & tortillas.
16.99
Milanesa
Two thin strips of steak, breaded and pan fried to perfection, served with rice, beans or french fries, lettuce, avocado and pico de gallo.
13.50
Steak Texana
8oz steak rib eye and grilled shrimp, served on a skillet plate. Served with fried potatoes, zucchini, and squash.
17.70
Tacos
Tacos al Pastor
Four soft tacos with marinated pork and grilled pineapple, topped with cilantro and onions; served with rice, refried beans and salsa verde.
14.99
Tacos de Carnitas
Four soft tacos with marinated pork topped with cilantro and onions; served with black beans, salsa verde, grilled jalapeno, radishes and green onions.
14.95
Tacos de Camar√≥n
Four soft tacos with grilled shrimp; garnished with queso fresco and pico de gallo; served with rice, lettuce, guacamole and pico de gallo.
15.25
Tacos de Pescado
Four soft tacos Ô¨Ålled with Ô¨Åsh grilled or fried; garnished with lettuce and topped with pico de gallo and fresh cheese, served with rice, lettuce, avocado, and pico de gallo.
15.25
Tacos Fiesta
Three soft corn tortillas: one grilled chicken, one grilled steak and one carnitas ( marinated pork); garnished with pico de gallo and fresh cheese, served with black beans and salsa verde.
12.99
Tacos de Carne Asada
Four soft corn tortilla with seasoned steak topped with onion and cilantro; served with rice, beans, salsa verde, grilled jalape√±o, radishes and green onions.
15.99
Tacos Alambre
Four soft tacos with your choice of grilled chicken or steak along with bacon and ham, green peppers and onions covered with melted cheese, cilantro and avocado slices; served with rice, beans, salsa verde, radishes, green onion and Chile toreado.
16.50
Tacos de Cochinita
Savor three exquisite tacos filled iwth Yucatecan-marinated pork, nestled in corn tortillas with pickled onions and cilantro, served along side saviry black beans.
12.99

Grilled chicken, steak, shrimp and chorizo.

17.25 - 33.99

Carnitas (marinated pork in Mexican spices)

Seafood Tostadas
Combination of fresh shrimp, scallops, fish, and crab meat all seasoned to perfection, grilled with chopped onions and bell peppers. Served on two tostadas and topped with lettuce, avocado, and pico de gallo.
15.50
Mexican Shrimp Cocktail
A traditional coastal favorite with large shrimp, avocado, pico de gallo, and a special tomato sauce.
16.50
Mojarra Frita
A big whole fried tilapia Ô¨Åsh; served with rice, lettuce, avocado, and pico de gallo.
16.50

Twelve shrimp saut√©ed in butter, lemon juice, tequila, garlic and cilantro; served with rice, lettuce, guacamole and pico de gallo.
14.99
Arroz con Mariscos
Grilled gulf shrimp, scallops, crab meat and Ô¨Åsh. served on a bed of Mexican rice topped with cheese dip.
14.50
Camarones a la Mexicana
Twelve shrimp cooked with grilled onions, tomatoes, jalapenos, and ranchero salsa; served with rice, lettuce, guacamole, and pico de gallo.
14.99
Camarones ala Cerveza
Twelve Gulf shrimp cooked in the pan in butter, onions, garlic and salsa de cerveza (beer sauce) served with rice, lettuce, guacamole and pico de gallo.
14.99
Camarones al Chipotle
Shrimps cooked with grilled onions and spicy chipotle sauce. Served with rice, lettuce, guacamole, pico de gallo, and tortillas.
14.99
Vegetarian
1. Two bean burritos topped with cheese sauce.
12.25
2. Two chiles rellenos served with rice and beans.
12.25
3. Two cheese quesadillas with mushrooms; served with rice.

12.25

Enchiladas Rancheras

Three grilled chicken enchiladas smothered in chipotle sauce and queso fresco, served with rice.
14.99

Five enchiladas: 1 carnitas [pork],1 ground beef, 1 shredded chicken,1 cheese,1 refried beans, smothered in cheese dip and salsa ranchera. Garnished with lettuce, sour cream, pico de gallo and queso fresco.
14.99
Enchiladas Seafood
A succulent combination of shrimp, crab meat , scallops, and Ô¨Åsh Ô¨Ålls three enchiladas, covered with cheese sauce and pico de gallo. Served with rice.
14.99
Enchiladas Coste√±as
Three cheese enchiladas covered with chunks of lobster cooked with pico de gallo and smothered in cheese sauce, served with rice.

Quesadilla Chilanga
10" flour tortilla stuffed with cheese, refried beans, chorizo, and pico de gallo.
12.75

A Ô¨Çour tortilla stuÔ¨Äed with cheese and chunks of lobster seasoned while cooked with pico de gallo.

name: Everest Cafe & Bar
raw_text:
‚ÄúPromoting a Healthy Lifestyle‚Äù
Dear Customers:
Don‚Äôt panic but be prepared for COVID-19. We practice good hygiene from hand washing to food
safety. My wife, Maya (from South Korea) and I would like to thank you for your support & trusting
us to prepare your meal. We been serving Nepalese, Indian & Korean cuisine in the city of St. Louis
since 2004.
I was born and raised in Manang, Nepal. When both parents passed away, I moved to Kathmandu
at age 16. In Kathmandu, I became homeless, because I was too young and could not find a job. I
remember every day, I was knocking on doors and looking for food in garbage cans. Many days, I
had nothing to eat. Many nights, I could not sleep, because of the fear of my safety and hunger. After
many months of my life struggles on the street of Kathmandu, I finally found a job at the KC
restaurant as a dishwasher & busboy. While I was working at the KC restaurant, I developed two
dreams. Dream of owning a restaurant and to help children who are poor and suffering as I was.
While I was working at the KC restaurant, I met Dr. James H. States, M.D. I had an opportunity to
come to the United States after my father, Dr. States adopted me in Nepal following his ascent of
Mt. Everest in 1983.
Chronic diseases such as heart disease, stroke, and diabetes are the leading causes of death in the
City of St. Louis. I believe that diet is an important factor in preventing chronic diseases and
maintaining a healthy lifestyle. ‚ÄúThe mission of Everest Caf√© & Bar is to promote a healthy
lifestyle by preparing fresh heart-healthy nutritious meals for our customers‚Äù.
I completed my graduate education in social work and public health at Saint Louis University
(www.slu.edu). I worked many years in areas of chronic disease prevention and health promotion.
I believe that I have prepared myself to be the most qualified chef in today‚Äôs restaurant industry to
prepare heart-healthy & nutritious meals for my customers.
Again, thank you for trusting us to prepare your meal and supporting my dream. Your satisfaction
is my primary concern. If you have any questions or comments, please let me know. Because of
your support, Everest Caf√© and Bar has been working to improve the health status of children and
women who are poor and suffering as I was. More information about our non-profit medical and
educational mission in Nepal, please visit us @ www.himalayanhealthmo.org
Best regards,
Dr. Devi Gurung States, DHSc., MPH., MSW.
Executive Chef & Owner

and Rice/Noodle Bowls
Chaat
Bombay Street Eats, You Will Lick Your Fingers Off
Baked Goods
Baked With Lots of¬† Love
and Zero Cruelty
OUR STORY
We want to invite you to our family-owned Green kitchen based in our beloved city of St. Louis. Both of us grew up loving street eats from Bombay (aka Mumbai). We want to share the best comfort eats from Bombay and other parts of the world with our guests.
It's scientifically proven that Plant-based meals and a vegan lifestyle, in general, are not only good for our health but also for the health of our planet. At BFJ, we use fresh and local produce with authentic spices; spices that taste amazing and provide a wealth of health. Our meals are cooked with love and kindness in a hope that they will spread everywhere.
In 2013, we started our journey with the first-ever 100% vegetarian Indian food truck in St Louis. During these years, we have received a tremendous amount of Love and Support from the folks of STL. In 2020 we transitioned to a fully plant-based restaurant in Creve Coeur, MO.
‚Äã
W
e have faced and continue to face challenges that have made us stronger and resilient. We want to thank each and every one who gave us their love and support. We hope that St Louis will continue to support our mission toward sustainability and a smaller carbon footprint. If you are ever in the neighborhood, please stop by to check out the bright and inviting dining room and our unique menu.
‚Äã
Sid & Krupa Panchal
LEARN MORE
Cecil Rhoades
from Google
‚Äã
This place has excellent food and staff. We went at a slower time in the day, and we were able to get our food quickly. The food is Vegan, and they have a ton of options that you wouldn't normally see for vegans. We ordered a "chicken" sandwich and "chicken" Tikka Naan wrap, which both came with fries. We got a slice of cheesecake and a Oatly milkshake later on. All in all, a great place to eat.
Jessica P.
from Yelp
Our friends raved about how good this place was and we had to try it! It was amazing! Everything was full of flavor and it was so yummy! I got the butter chicken bowl - WOW the flavors were exquisite! My fianc√© got the chicken sandwich and loved it too! We shared a blueberry pie shake - another mind blower! So delicious! We'll definitely be coming back often!
Hemanth Krishnappa
from Google
Delicious!!! We had kachori chat, vada pav, pav bhaji, gobi & fried rice, masala fries and chai. Everything was delicious. Had to wait a little while for the order. Staff was courteous. Felt a bit expensive but understand vegan restaurants are a little expensive.
Overall a very good place!
Jadababy
from Happycow
Got the butter chk‚Äôn n it was so delicious I was obsessed. Also loved the milkshakes, samosas, and spring rolls. Would a million times rec to a friend and I am so happy I stopped in here while in St. Louis!!

Every item in our menu is prepared with authentic Indian herbs & spices imported from India. Each dish is prepared in our kitchen with exteme care to ensure you consistently good quality. Our food is mild & medium spicy. Please advise the waiter if you prefer your food spicy hot.
"Home Style Cooking is our Speciality" - We thank our customers for their patronage.

Our promise to you
30-day money back guarantee
HugeDomains provides a 100% satisfaction guarantee on every domain name that we sell through our website. If you buy a domain and are unhappy with it, we will accept the return within 30 days and issue a full refund ‚Äì no questions asked.
Quick delivery of the domain
In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
Safe and secure shopping
Your online safety and security is our top priority. We understand the importance of protecting your personal information.
We protect your information through SSL encryption technology, providing the safest, most secure shopping experience possible. Additionally, you may checkout with PayPal or Escrow.com.
FAQs
See more FAQs
How do I transfer to another registrar such as GoDaddy?
Yes, you can transfer your domain to any registrar or hosting company once you have purchased it. Since domain transfers are a manual process, it can take up to 5 days to transfer the domain.
Domains purchased with payment plans are not eligible to transfer until all payments have been made. Please remember that our 30-day money back guarantee is void once a domain has been transferred.
For transfer instructions to GoDaddy, please
click here
.
How do I get the domain after the purchase?
Once you purchase the domain we will push it into an account for you at our registrar, NameBright.com, we will then send you an email with your NameBright username and password. In most cases access to the domain will be available within one to two hours of purchase, however access to domains purchased after business hours will be available within the next business day.
What comes with the domain name?
Nothing else is included with the purchase of the domain name. Our registrar NameBright.com does offer email packages for a yearly fee, however you will need to find hosting and web design services on your own.
Do you offer payment plans?
Yes we offer payment plans for up to 12 months.
See details
.
How do I keep my personal information private?
If you wish the domain ownership information to be private, add WhoIs Privacy Protection to your domain. This hides your personal information from the general public.
To add privacy protection to your domain, do so within your registrar account. NameBright offers WhoIs Privacy Protection for free for the first year, and then for a small fee for subsequent years.
Whois information is not updated immediately. It typically takes several hours for Whois data to update, and different registrars are faster than others. Usually your Whois information will be fully updated within two days.

About the Business
Szechuan means a lot of things, the culture, the people, the custom and the food. Ahh.. and we manage to bring you its typical and fabulous flavor that arouse all around your taste buds. Crafting its authentic and traditional ingredients and recipes, we are proud to introduce the one of kind, the Szechuan Cuisine! From top to bottom, from single grand of chili pepper to well experienced Szechuan-raised chiefs, we preserve the best authentication in every single possible way so that we can sincerely invite you, our dear guest, to join our cruise journey of Szechuan!"

About the Business
Your BBQ Adventure Awaits!
Located at 567-A Melville Ave, University City, MO 63130, Sikao Life Chinese BBQ brings the vibrant and flavorful tradition of Chinese barbecue to the heart of University City. Specializing in authentic, flame-grilled skewers and a variety of delicious small plates, we‚Äôre passionate about creating a dining experience that captures the essence of Chinese street food culture. Each skewer is seasoned and grilled to perfection, offering bold and unforgettable flavors in every bite.

About the Business
Welcome to Umami Seasons Hotpot, where traditional flavors meet modern culinary excellence in the heart of our vibrant city! Our cozy restaurant invites you to indulge in a hotpot experience like no other, featuring a rich variety of fresh, locally-sourced ingredients and a symphony of broths that simmer with depth and complexity.

Wix.com | Welcome to Mr. Ping's Noodles
top of page
This website was built on Wix. Create yours today.
Get Started
Home
About
Menu
Contact
Hours & Directions
More
Use tab to navigate through the menu items.
Dine-In, Take-Out, or Delivery 314-631-1212
MENU
Dine-In Or Carry Out, We Deliver Too!
All items are sold all day, made to perfection for you. Don't be afraid to ask questions and we will help accommodate you to the best of our ability. Note that prices change as the economy does, so please check with current prices to ensure optimal ordering.

DELIVERIES ARE A $10 MINIMUM PURCHASE WITH A $3.50 DELIVERY CHARGE. *Delivery charge is not a tip paid to your driver. Please feel free to award your delivery driver with a tip for their amazing service*
‚ùß indicates a dish to be Hot & Spicy
Soups
We serve two satisfyingly delicious soups for any occasion. Choose your own bowl of yumminess!
Picture Shown is: Hot & Sour Soup
Egg Drop Soup
An old Chinese recipe of wispy beaten eggs boiled in a broth ready to eat!
$4.50
Hot and Sour Soup (‚ùß)
A family recipe that is as good as when they first made it. Contains veggies, tofu, and chicken. Be warned, it is spicy and addicting!
$4.50
Appetizers
Variety of items to start your very own feast. Begin your journey of deliciousness with one of these. Or more.
Picture Shown is: Crab Rangoon
Vegetable Egg Roll
No meat, only vegetables in this egg roll!
$2.50
Egg  Roll (1)
Pork and veggies all rolled up into a delicious start to your meal.
$2.50
Chicken Egg Roll (1)
An alternative to those who do not eat pork, chicken egg rolls are just as yummy, if not more satisfyingly delicious!
$2.95
Fried Wonton (4)
Now with chicken filled goodness, all wrapped up in a wonton wrapper and deep fried, perfect for our non-pork eating friends!
$5.50
Crab Rangoon (4)
A mixture of cream cheese, scallions, and flaked crab meat wrapped in a wonton wrapper and fried to perfection! A crowd favorite! A must-try.
$5.50
Chicken Wings (8)
Unfortunately due to the shortage, we no longer serve whole wings. Still the same delish recipe, our flats and drummies are lightly seasoned and breaded and then deep-fried.
$10.95
Pot Stickers (6)
Chicken and veggie filled dumplings which are steamed and then pan-fried. Served with a house-made pot sticker sauce perfect for dipping. May also be steamed only.
$10.95
Fried Shrimp (6)
Breaded shrimp fried golden and ready to pop in your mouth.
$7.95
Appetizer Combo
A combination of 2 pork egg rolls, 2 fried wontons, 4 piece chicken wings, and 4 crab rangoon.
$13.95
Fried Rice/Steam Rice
Stir-fried rice made in a wok. All fried rice is made with only green and white onions. 
Steam Rice is a brown sauce made with white and green onions over a bed of steam rice.

About the Business
Business owner information
Phuong N.
Business Owner
This is our new delivery area. Boulevard Heights, Carondelet, Holly Hills, Patch, Bevo Mill, Tower Grove (South & East), The Hill, Princeton Heights, South Hampton, St. Louis Hills, Lindenwood Park, Ellendale, Clifton Heights, Southwest Garden, North Hampton, Dutchtown (SW part only. Nothing past Grand/Meramec nor N or E of that), also included in delivery area are NE part of Affton, NW part of Lemay, and very eastern sides of Shrewsbury and Maplewood. We can go to Downtown, Clayton and S. County for special orders/catering, with a day or two advance notice. Please be patient, we only have 2 delivery drivers. As you can see, it's a huge area we are covering.

Taste of Bo Fung Chinese Kitchen is known for its delicious and unique Chinese dishes.
Bo Fung Chinese Kitchen became known for dishes like colored eggplant, chef beef, Chinese cauliflower in a dry pot, sweet T-bone steak from an old secret Chinese recipe, etc. ... Although some of the dishes served at Bo Fung Chinese Kitchen may sound familiar, they are highly steeped in authenticity.
The selections are huge with noted names and many with new elegant tastes from  Sweet & Sour Pork to Garlic Chicken to Kung Pao Beef, etc.

Where We Started
Our Story
China King Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese cuisine in St Louis, MO. China King's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for dine-in or take-out meals in the St Louis community. Our restaurant is known for its variety of tastes and high-quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

View Full Menu
What our customers say
Reviews
We got the Dumplings, House special egg foo young, House Special Lo Mein, and House special fried rice. Everything that we tried was delicious! It did not disappoint and I highly recommend it!
Cristina Gomez
Best crab rangoons in the city! Everything was ready fast and super hot. Got the Honey Chicken and the Orange Chicken. Both were delicious. The egg drop soup was good as well.
Shelby Johnson
This place has really great tasting, always hot, and super fresh food. My most recent order was a combination meal of Beef with Broccoli w/ pork fried rice and pork eggroll. The beef and broccoli were scrumptious, one of the best-tasting dishes I have had in years.
Monica J.
Good food selection and the price is comparatively cheaper than other Chinese restaurants. They do deliver. My favorites are General Tso's Chicken, Szechuan Slice Pork, Egg Drop with Wonton Soup, and Dumplings.
Sean T.
By far my favorite restaurant! You can order for pick up or have them delivered. Either way, you get your money's worth and it is delicious food! I have never had to wait long to get my order, and they are always punctual and polite.
Tony D.
I have gone to various Chinese food restaurants in the area. China King is by far the best tasting. Really good food. They are always really nice and welcoming when I get my take out here. Highly recommend them if you are getting Chinese takeout.
Jasmine S.

About
Our chefs specialize in authentic and delicious Thai food. The staff at Zapp Thai Restaurant is devoted to serving customers mouthwatering dishes that feature the highest quality ingredients available. Z1. Pad Thai, Z2. Pad See Ew and Z3. Thai Lo Mein are all prepared quickly and delivered to you right away.
Zapp Thai Restaurant uses only the freshest ingredients around, ensuring that every dish is of the highest possible quality. Not sure what you're in the mood for? Try one of our specialties including Z4. Udon Pad Kee Mao , Z5. Drunken Noodle, Z6. Lard Na, Z7. Golden Pillow, and more.

Appetizers

Rice vinegar pickle, miso dressed
Karaage (7)
Japanese fried chicken served with lemon wedge and Kewpie mayo
Ramen
Chicken Shoyu (14)
Shoyu ramen with aromatic chicken oil. Topped with pork shoulder chasyu, menma, scallion, and nori
Pork Shoyu (15)
Shoyu ramen aromatic rendered fatback. Topped with pork shoulder chasyu, menma, scallion, and nori
Tantanmen (15)
Shoyu ramen with aromatic chili oil and sesame paste. Topped with ground pork, menma, scallion, bean sprouts
Tsukemen
(Dipped)
Original Tsukemen (15)
Cold rinsed thick noodle served aside concentrated scallop aroma dipping broth. Topped with pork shoulder chasyu, menma, scallion, and nori
Mazemen
(Brothless)
Original Aburasoba (13)
Thick noodles tossed in scallop oil and house shoyu. Topped with pork shoulder chasyu, menma, gyofun, nori, beansprouts
Tantanmen Brothless (14)
Thick noodles tossed in chili oil, sesame paste, and house shoyu. Topped with ground pork, menma, scallion, bean sprout
Drinks
Green Tea Can (3)
It√Ö¬çen √Ö¬åi Ocha
Orange Fanta√Ç¬†(3)
How Service Works
1. If you see a line, that means there's a wait so hop in! It generally moves quickly, so don't be scared.
2. Once you've entered, you'll be greeted by a team member who will direct you to your seats.
3. There is a self serve station in the front of the dining room, we suggest grabbing your water, utensils and napkins before you sit.
4. Once seated, you will use the QR code corresponding to your specific seat. It will direct you to our Square site where you can place your order and pay, then your food will arrive shortly thereafter.
5. Slurp up! While we are grateful for your patronage and want you to enjoy the food and atmosphere, please be mindful of your table time if there is a wait. NO MORE than 1 hour; the average Japanese person eats ramen in 5-10 minutes.
FAQs
Do you accommodate large parties?
√¢¬Ä¬ç
We will do our best, but with only 24 total seats we strongly prefer groups of four or less. We cannot guarantee grouped seating for anything larger.
Do I need a reservation?
√¢¬Ä¬ç
No reservations, walk-ins only. Ramen shops are like diners, very casual.
Do you offer takeout or delivery?
Dine-in only. To-go ramen is virtually non-existent in Japan as it does not carry well.
Do you have any vegetarian/vegan/gluten-free options?
No, all of our entree dishes contain meat/seafood products as well as wheat noodles.

Once seated, you will use the QR code corresponding to your specific seat. It will direct you to our Square site where you can place your order and pay, then your food will arrive shortly thereafter.

No, all of our entree dishes contain meat/seafood products as well as wheat noodles.

Korean BBQ and Hot Pot Menu
Lunch
Join us for a flavorful lunch at KPOT, where you can enjoy our extensive Korean BBQ and Hot Pot menu, all served with fresh ingredients and bold flavors to satisfy your midday cravings. Plus, with quick service and ingredients ready to go, you won't spend your whole lunch break waiting.

Dinner
Gather your friends and family for an unforgettable dinner at KPOT, where Korean BBQ and hot pot come together for a fun, interactive dining experience filled with mouthwatering flavors and shared moments around the table. See our Korean BBQ and Hot Pot menus below!
Price Varies by Location

home
Pearl Caf√© offers award-winning Thai cuisine to the Florissant, Missouri community and the entire St. Louis region.
Ôªø
Pearl Cafe is located at 8416 North Lindbergh Blvd, Florissant, Missouri, offering some of the best Thai food in the St. Louis region.¬† Phone: +1 314-831-3701
They have been voted the
Best Thai food in St. Louis,
year after year, by the
Riverfront Times and Ian Froeb
.¬† At Pearl Cafe, you will find an extensive Thai cuisine guaranteed to please any palette.¬†¬†In addition to our food selection, we offer over 100 beers and 150 single-malt scotches from around the world.¬† So rest assured that your next sip at Pearl will be unforgettable.
Thai food is among the highest-rated cuisine by food lovers around the globe, with many Thai dishes at the top among all cuisines worldwide.¬† View our
menu
to find your favorite Thai cuisine.
SPECIAL NOTE
: we will be closed for vacation from July 2 thru July 9, 2023.
The online reviews for Pearl Caf√©, as of February 6, 2023, are as follows:

St Louis Restaurant Review
published a
review
on January 31, 2023.¬† You can visit our listing in the
St. Louis Restaurant Directory
section.
Additionally,
Pearl Cafe
was ranked the #9 Asian restaurant in St. Louis by TripAdvisor, released by
Fox2Now
.

Business owner information
Nared V.
Business Owner
When the people of St. Peters crave a fresh, delicious meal, they come to Hibachi Boy. Since 2014, we've made a name for ourselves by serving up handcrafted sushi and hibachi cuisine cooked fresh when you order. Whether you call in for take-out or you dine with us in our clean and inviting cafe, you can expect the same fantastic service from our friendly team.

About Us
Addie‚Äôs Thai House is a distinctive restaurant serving carefully prepared, authentic Thai cuisine. Located in the Hog Hollow neighborhood above the Missouri River in Chesterfield Missouri, this popular restaurant is the winner of several local and regional accolades as well as the prestigious international Thai Select award. Addie‚Äôs Thai House combines what every great restaurant should possess; great food, an air of relaxation and comfort surrounding diners and service which is friendly, attentive but not cumbersome.

Take Out Orders: ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† ¬† All Day
The last diningroom seating is 30 minutes before closing time.
Private Events, Banquets & Catering
Addie‚Äôs Thai House offers the St Louis metro area affordable Catering options and an array of Banquet services, which include family style dining for intimate gatherings, meetings and banquets small and large with Buffet, French or Russian service. Breakfast, lunch and dinner menus are available for private events. Additionally, exclusive happy hour parties or cocktail parties on the large Patio or in the Tavern are, also, available.¬† There are four primary rooms available to book, as well as the Biergarden and a large meeting room.
The Rama X Room holds twelve guests comfortably and is perfect for boardroom style meetings, dinners, card club and Majong club gatherings, and small private celebrations.
The Rama V Room seats thirty-six guests comfortably and is ideal for medium size private events and dinners.
The Rama IX Main Dining Room holds up to 100 guests. The main Dining room can be used in conjunction with other rooms for larger, private events.
Henry‚Äôs Tavern is the bar at Addie‚Äôs Thai House. Decorated with old St. Louis Breweriana and named after Addie‚Äôs brother, the Tavern is ideal for private parties and happy hours for up to thirty guests, as well as private dinners for up to sixteen guests.
The Biergarten holds up to 60 people and is perfect for larger, corporate happy hour gatherings and private events.

Welcome to Sunisa's Thai Restaurant ( St Peters ). Our menu features Yen Ta Fo, Tom-Kha, Masaman Curry, and more! Don't forget to try our Grilled Lemongrass Beef and the Tom Yum Seafood Noodle Soup! Find us at Mid Rivers Mall Drive. We're not far from Schnucks! Order online for carryout!

‚Äì Ground chicken, whole roasted peanut, and ginger ‚Äì $11.50
Larb Gai
‚Äì Ground chicken and roasted rice powder ‚Äì $11.50
Cup of Soups ‚Äì $6.50
Tom Yum Kung
‚Äì Thai sour and spicy lemongrass broth with shrimp and mushroom
Tom Kha Gai
‚Äì Coconut cream broth with chicken and mushroom.
Tofu Soup
‚Äì Clear broth, fresh tofu, glass noodle, and lettuce.
Vegetable Soup
‚Äì Mixed veggies in clear broth.
Soup Bo Vien
‚Äì Beef meatball in pho broth.
Viet Thai House Specialty ‚Äì $22.95
The following dishes are served with steamed rice.¬† Additional $2 substitute for fried rice or brown rice.
Spicy Catfish
‚Äì Catfish filet stir-fried with eggplant, onion, bell pepper, and spicy basil sauce.
Grouper
‚Äì Crispy filet served with Panang curry, green curry, or spicy basil.
Pra Nin Rah Prik (Basil Tilapia)
‚Äì Deep-fried Tilapia filet served with light sweet chili basil sauce, pineapple chunk, onion, green bean, tomato, and bell peppers.
Gang Quah Shrimp
‚Äì The heat of this exotic curry balances out its sweetness of pineapple, tomato, bell pepper, and basil leaf.
Beef Hot Plate
‚Äì Sliced steak, green bean, carrot, and mushroom stir-fried with garlic and black pepper sauce and served on a hot plate.
Stir-fried Seafood
‚Äì Combination of shrimp, mussels, squid, and crab meat.¬† Stir-fried with green bean, bell pepper, and onion in yellow curry powder and garlic.
Rice Plates
Lunch is served Tuesday thru Friday from 11 am to 3 pm.
The following rice plates are served with fresh tomato, cucumber, lettuce, pickled carrot, and lime fish sauce ‚Äì
Lunch is $11.95
‚Äì
Dinner is $16.25

‚Äì Grilled marinated in lemongrass ‚Äì Angus beef.
Com Tom Nuong
‚Äì Grilled marinated jumbo shrimp.
Com Thit Nuong
‚Äì Grilled marinated pork.
Com Ga Nuong
‚Äì Grilled marinated chicken.
Bun ‚Äì Vermicelli Noodle Bowl
All noodle bowls are served with fresh lettuce, bean sprout, pickled carrot, cucumber, onion, and lime-fish sauce topped with grounded peanuts ‚Äì
Lunch is $11.95
‚Äì
Dinner is $16.25
Bun Bo Nuong
‚Äì Marinated grilled Angus beef.
Bun Ga Nuong
‚Äì Grilled marinated chicken.
Bun Sate Chicken
(sub beef or shrimp, add $2) ‚Äì Stir-fried chicken in sate sauce.¬† No cucumber or lettuce with this dish.
Bun Cha Glo
‚Äì Vietnamese crispy egg roll.
Bun Thit Nuong
‚Äì Marinated grilled pork.
Bun Thit Nuong Cha Glo
‚Äì Vietnamese egg roll and marinated grilled pork.
Bun Tom Nuong
‚Äì Grilled shrimp.
Bun Dac Biet
(add $3)(Not available in lunch size) ‚Äì Combination of meat and egg roll.
Thai Curry
Lunch is $11.96
‚Äì
Dinner is $16.50
‚Äì Lunch is served Tuesday thru Friday from 11 am to 3 pm.
The following dishes are served with steamed rice.¬† Your choice of chicken, pork, tofu, or vegetable (sub beef or shrimp, add $2).¬† Sub-fried rice or brown rice, add $2.
Red Curry
‚Äì The blending of various kinds of herbs and spices with shrimp paste.¬† The dominant flavor is different kinds of red chili and shallot.¬† Prep with bamboo shoots, bell pepper, and basil.
Yellow Curry
‚Äì The blending between Thai herbs and spices with Indian spices, especially turmeric, which provides yellow color to the curry.¬† Prep with potato chunks and white onion.
Green Curry
‚Äì Similar to the Red Curry, however, green (young) chili is used instead of red chili, therefore, has a unique greeny aroma and hotness from green chili.
Panang Curry
‚Äì Another version of Red Curry with a strong flavor from cumin, coriander seed, and dried red chili.¬† Prep with bell pepper and basil.
Mussaman Curry
‚Äì Indian-style curry with high contents of Indian spices such as mace, cardamom, cinnamon, coriander seed, and cumin cooked with peanuts.¬† Prep with potato, onion, and cashew.
Entrees
Lunch is $11.95
‚Äì
Dinner is $16.95
‚Äì Lunch is served Tuesday thru Friday from 11 am to 3 pm.
The following dishes are served with steamed rice.¬† Your choice of chicken, pork, tofu, or vegetable (sub beef or shrimp, add $2).¬† Substitute fried rice or brown rice ‚Äì add $2.
Veggie Thai
‚Äì mixed veggies stir-fried in garlic sauce.
Viet Thai Chicken
‚Äì Crispy chicken glazed with Viet-Thai sauced and served with steamed broccoli.
Pad Kra Prow
(Spicy Basil) ‚Äì Ground meat stir-fried with green bell pepper, white onion, and basil leaf with chili and garlic sauce.
Thai Rama
‚Äì Peanut sauce sauteed with fresh garlic and chili paste served on a bed of broccoli.
Garlic and Pepper
‚Äì Green bean and carrot in black pepper and garlic sauce and served on a bed of shredded cabbage.
Pad Prik King
‚Äì Green bean, bell pepper, basil leaf, and chopped kaffir lime leaf sauteed in curry paste.
Spicy Bamboo
‚Äì Bamboo shoot, bell pepper, and basil stir-fried in lemongrass chili paste.
Baby Corn
‚Äì Baby corn, mushroom, bamboo shoot, carrot, zucchini, and onion, stir-fried in garlic sauce.
Spicy Eggplant
‚Äì Choice of ground meat stir-fried in chili sauce with eggplant, bell pepper, onion, and basil leaf.
Xao Xa Ot
(Lemongrass) ‚Äì Stir-fried lemongrass, chili, onion, and garlic.
Ginger
‚Äì Mixed veggies stir-fried in ginger sauce.
Cashew
‚Äì Mixed veggies sauteed in peppercorn sauce with cashew nut.
Broccoli
‚Äì Broccoli and carrot sauteed in garlic oyster sauce.
Sweet and Sour
‚Äì Choice of sliced meat, pineapple chunk, tomato, onion, and bell pepper in sweet and sour sauce.
Pho
Vietnamese Beef Noodle Soup
The following Pho is garnished with a combination of cilantro, onion, basil, and bean sprout.¬† Rice noodles in five-spice beef broth.
Pho Dac Biet
‚Äì Combination of rare beef, meatball, tendon, tripe, and brisket ‚Äì $17.95
Pho Seafood
‚Äì Combination seafood including shrimp, squid, scallops, crab meat, and fish ball ‚Äì $17.95
