‚Äì Chicken yellow curry soup broth, rice noodles, and bean sprouts.¬† Garnished with pickled sour mustard, fried garlic, onion, cilantro, and crispy egg noodle.
Noodles and Rice
The following noodle and rice dishes are prepared with your choice of chicken, pork, tofu, or mixed vegetable (substitute beef or shrimp, add $2).
Lunch is $11.95
‚Äì
Dinner is $16.95
Pad Thai
‚Äì This is considered one of the most traditional dishes from Thailand and is made with rice stick noodles, bean sprouts, eggs, light green onion, and grounded peanuts.
Pad Khi Mao
(Spicy Noodle) ‚Äì A signature dish of Thailand.¬† Made with rice flat noodles, stir-fried in spicy lemon grass chili paste green bean, bell pepper, onion, tomato, and basil leaf.
Pad Se Yu
‚Äì Flat rice noodles stir-fried with egg, broccoli, and carrot in sweet dark soy sauce.
Pad Woon Sen
‚Äì This dish is popular all over Thailand.¬† Using mung bean noodles combined with veggies and full flavor of fried garlic.
Spicy Jun Noodle
‚Äì Country-style Pad Thai with crab meat, bean sprouts, onion, and topped with grounded peanuts.
Khua Noodle
‚Äì Rice flat noodles, egg, and bean sprouts stir-fried in light garlic sauce.¬† Served on a bed of fresh lettuce.
Chow Mein
‚Äì Stir-fried egg noodles with fresh vegetables in light soy sauce.
Thai Fried Rice
‚Äì Fried rice with egg, tomato, and white onion.
Pineapple Fried Rice
‚Äì This is a classic unique flavor of curry powder rice stir-fried with chicken, pineapple chunk, egg, onion, raisin, and cashew nut.
BBQ Pork Fried Rice
‚Äì Fried rice with BBQ pork, onion, raisin, egg, and topped with cashew nut.
Andaman Fried Rice
(not available for lunch) ‚Äì Combination seafood (shrimp, mussel, squid, crab meat), egg, onion, and basil leaf.¬† In spicy lemongrass chili paste ‚Äì $17.50

Fun, Fizz, and Flavor for All
Fixin‚Äô to find hip digs with good food? Welcome to our pad where we offer over-the-top twists on ordinary food. Before you split, make sure to check out our unreal dessert options! Don‚Äôt be a wet rag and come to Soda Fountain Express!
Our burgers are made with fresh, locally sourced ingredients and perfectly cooked.¬† Would you be interested in something extra? You can add a side of crispy fries or onion rings to finish your meal. Indulge in our wide selection of ice cream flavors. Whether you love traditional favorites like vanilla and chocolate or want to try something new and exciting like our Freak shakes.¬† We have a flavor for you!
The Soda Fountain Express offers first come, first served spaces both inside and out. So cruise on in and have a seat at our retro counter or take in the sights from the patio, daddy-o.

Our Menu
Place a Catering Order
Fufu
Fufu is an African staple that is served throughout the continent. Culturally, fufu is similar to a family recipe with a famous ingredient that makes it their own. Every country in Africa has its own way of making fufu that individualizes the dish and makes it personal to the location you are in. The consistency of fufu is closest to mashed potato, although a bit firmer, and our fufu is cooked with plantain and yam flour. Fufu is meant to be used to scoop up your stew or other entree.
Jollof Rice
Jollof rice is another staple dish served in West Africa. It is white rice cooked in a tomato-based sauce with our West African curry, garlic, and ginger. Jollof rice is often served at celebrations, festivals, and gatherings, and¬†there's a friendly rivalry among West African countries about who makes the best jollof rice, leading to many debates and competitions. We think you‚Äôll find ours to be a contender!
Entrees
All entrees come with your choice of side - Fufu or Jollof rice.
Beef Stew
Our Beef Stew is slow-cooked to bring out deep, robust flavors. Tender chunks of beef are steeped in a rich tomato base, infused with garlic, ginger, and African spices. This classic West African dish is bold and warming, making it a satisfying staple with a hint of spice.
Oxtail in Palm Nut Stew
Our Beef Stew is slow-cooked to bring out deep, robust flavors. Tender chunks of beef are steeped in a rich tomato base, infused with garlic, ginger, and African spices. This classic West African dish is bold and warming, making it a satisfying staple with a hint of spice.
Egusi
A beloved West African stew, Egusi is a savory blend of ground melon seeds, leafy greens, and spices simmered to perfection. This hearty dish is rich in flavor and texture, offering a nutty taste that‚Äôs perfect for scooping with FUFU. Every bite is a comforting reminder of home and tradition.
Beef Suya
Spicy, smoky, and irresistibly flavorful, our Beef Suya is West African street food at its finest. Thinly sliced beef is seasoned with a rich, peanut-based suya spice mix and grilled to perfection, delivering a tantalizing taste of African spice in every bite. Suya lovers, this one‚Äôs for you!
Chicken Suya
A delicious twist on traditional suya, our Chicken Suya is marinated in our Suya Spice, a bold peanut and chili spice mix, then grilled to juicy perfection. Packed with smoky heat and a hint of sweetness, this West African favorite is perfect for those who love a burst of flavor with every bite.
Tofu Suya
For a plant-based twist on a classic, our Tofu Suya is marinated in a signature suya spice blend made with ground peanuts and chili, then grilled for that perfect smoky flavor. This West African-inspired skewer is bursting with spice and warmth, ideal for vegans and suya lovers alike.
Pepper Goat
For those who love bold flavors and a spicy kick, our Pepper Goat is a must-try! Tender goat meat is cooked in a fiery pepper sauce, seasoned with African spices that pack just the right amount of heat. It‚Äôs a vibrant dish that brings warmth and excitement to every bite.
Zo-Zo Wings
Our Zo-Zo Chicken Wings bring a fiery West African twist to a beloved favorite. Marinated in a special blend of African spices and herbs, these wings are grilled to juicy perfection with a crisp, flavorful coating that delivers a spicy, smoky kick. Perfect for sharing (or not)!
Goat Pepper Soup
Warm up with our Goat Pepper Soup, a spicy and aromatic broth with tender pieces of goat meat that melt in your mouth. This West African classic is a staple for gatherings, offering a bold kick of spice and warmth that lingers in the best way.
Fish Stew
A coastal delight, our Fish Stew is crafted with fresh golden pompano simmered in a vibrant tomato and pepper sauce, infused with African spices. Inspired by West Africa‚Äôs coastal cuisines, it‚Äôs a taste of the sea and the spice that transports you right to the shores.
Sides
Fufu
Soft, smooth, and made for dipping! FUFU is a classic West African accompaniment, made from cassava or yam, kneaded to perfection for a smooth, stretchy texture. Perfectly paired with stews or soups, it's a staple that brings together families around the table.
Jollof Rice
A West African treasure known for its vibrant, spicy tomato base, Jollof Rice is a colorful plate of fluffy, flavorful rice that dances with bell peppers, onions, and aromatic spices. Each spoonful is a taste of home, joy, and celebration across Africa, uniting communities with its unforgettable flavor.
Beignets
Light, fluffy, and dusted with powdered sugar, our Beignets are a delightful twist on a beloved West African-inspired treat. Each bite of these pillowy, sweet pastries melts in your mouth, perfect with a cup of tea or coffee for a moment of pure indulgence.
Fried Plantains
Golden and deliciously caramelized, our Fried Plantains are a West African staple, offering a sweet and savory treat with every bite. With their crispy edges and soft centers, they‚Äôre the perfect complement to any meal, adding a taste of home and warmth to every plate.
Black Eyed Peas Au Jus
A soulful embrace of black-eyed peas simmered in a savory, slow-cooked broth, rich with herbs and spices. This comforting dish channels the heart of West African cuisine, where simplicity and depth come together to create a nourishing staple with every bite.
Beverages
Ginger Tea
Bold and warming, our Ginger Tea is a soothing blend with a gentle spice that awakens the senses. This West African favorite is brewed with fresh ginger root known for its health benefits and comforting heat blended with a refreshing pineapple juice making it the perfect drink for a cozy moment of relaxation.
Hibiscus Tea
Refreshing and beautifully vibrant, our Hibiscus Tea is brewed from sun-dried hibiscus flowers, offering a slightly tangy and floral taste. Known as ‚Äúzobo‚Äù or ‚Äúbissap‚Äù in West Africa, this deep red tea is as revitalizing as it is rich in tradition and culture.
Chicken Yassa
A West African classic, Chicken Yassa features tender chicken marinated in a zesty blend of lemon, mustard, and spices, then slow-cooked with caramelized onions for a deeply savory, tangy taste. This dish is a beautiful balance of bold, bright flavors that dance on the palate with every bite.

RUTH'S PAIRINGS
HAPPY HOUR + BAR
Host an Event at Ruth's
All of our private spaces have dedicated service and catering for your special event.
Bring Ruth's Chris to Your Event
We‚Äôll make sure your catered meal is just one more perfect aspect of your event.
The Best Steak Meets the Best View
We are a family owned franchise since 2009. Nowhere else in St. Louis can you find a better view of the arch from your table, where you‚Äôll get a perfect steak every single time, hand cut every day and served sizzling on a 500-degree plate. Here, it‚Äôs all about delivering the very best dining experience in the city, again and again.
Dress for the meal you deserve.
At Ruth‚Äôs Chris, we promote a family-friendly, fine dining atmosphere.¬†We require our guests to not wear clothing with exposed undergarments, revealing tops that show excessive midriff or cleavage, offensive graphics, gym wear, bucket hats or baseball hats.¬†Hats and team support jerseys are welcome in our bar areas. Please ensure your entire dining party is aware of our policy.
Management reserves the right to interpret these policies at their own discretion.
We thank you for your understanding and for your support.
Sign-Up and Be In The Know.
Be the first to receive news and updates on all things Ruth's Chris St. Louis.
Join us for an exclusive evening of legendary food and wine pairings.
Learn More
HOST AN EVENT AT RUTH'S
Host a business meeting, rehearsal dinner, or a special event in one of our private rooms, with no rental fee or tech fees. Each of our private spaces has all the connectivity you need, plus dedicated service and catering.

For all of our wine lovers, our exclusive wine lockers are a great way to always have your favorite bottles on hand. All Wine Locker Members enjoy exclusive benefits. Call us to find out more and reserve your wine locker.

To our Gluten sensitive customers.
We currently can offer the following option for our gluten sensitive customers. We can make any of our sandwiches and put it on greens or in a container and remove all gluten products. This is not our ultimate goal, but it does seem to work for many customers. We truly appreciate your patience and continued support.
Vince Valenza
President Blues City Deli Inc.
DELIVERIES
BLUES CITY DELI INC. DOES NOT AUTHORIZE ANYONE OR COMPANY TO DELIVER OUR PRODUCTS AND ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ORDERS DELIVERED BY OTHER. WE DO NOT APPROVE OF ANY ONLINE ORDER/DELIVERY SERVICES.
Food Safety & Allergens:
Menu items are cooked to order. The FDA advises consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness, especially if you have certain medical conditions. We openly handle several allergens throughout our locations, including dairy, soy, tree nuts, (e.g., almond, coconut, etc.), egg, wheat and others. While we take precautions to keep ingredients separate, we cannot guarantee that any of our beverages or food items are allergen free as we use shared equipment to store, prepare and serve. Before placing your order, please inform your server if a person in your party has a food allergy.

St. Louis‚Äô Upscale And Friendly Eatery & Cocktail Bar.
The neighborhood establishment that carries a classy, comfortable and personable ambiance. The menu is eclectic and upscale, featuring seasonal, hand-crafted American cuisine. Our patrons can call 801 Local their own with pride.

Specialty Skewers
Specialty skewers can be added to any Tucanos' Churrasco. A skewer of your choice is cooked to order and brought to your table by your meat server. Each item is priced per skewer and sharing is encouraged.  Cooking times vary and availability is limited.
Shrimp Skewer
see pricing

Center Cut Sirloin Wrapped in Bacon Skewer
see pricing

see pricing

tucanos specialty item
Beverages
Brazilian Traditions
Brazilian Lemonade
see pricing
A festive lemonade freshly-made from Brazilian Lemons and can be added onto with any of our pure fruit purees. It‚Äôs also bottomless. 
You can add other fruit to your Brazilian Lemonade too:
Mango ‚Ä¢ Passion Fruit ‚Ä¢ Pineapple ‚Ä¢ Guava Raspberry ‚Ä¢ Strawberry
note: Brazilian Lemonade contains dairy
Fresh Fruit Juices
see pricing
Enjoy a refreshing, fruity drink with your Churrasco. Choose between Mango, Passion Fruit, Pineapple, Guava, Raspberry or Strawberry juices.
Guarana
see pricing
A refreshing soft-drink from the heart of the Amazon
Brazilian Sunrise
see pricing
A drink sure to wake-up your taste buds with mango, passion fruit, and lemon-lime rising over grenadine.
Tucanos Specialty Blended Drinks
Rio De Janeiro
see pricing
A festive flavor that smacks of sunny beaches and distant sea breezes with passion fruit, lemon-lime, ice cream, and topped with whipped cream and sweet coconut flakes.
Amazon
see pricing
Look forward to the combined flavors of Brazil‚Äôs fresh fruits(mango, papaya, pineapple, and banana) with ice cream to add sparkle to your dining.
Ipanema
see pricing
You might forget about the girl from Ipanema after one taste of this coconut milk, banana, raspberry and ice cream treat.
Tucanos
see pricing
Our namesake drink takes the best of Brazil‚Äôs signature fruits and blends them to an irresistible sip of mango, passion fruit, pineapple, papaya, lemon-lime, and ice cream.

Notice: consuming raw or under cooked meat, poultry, fish or eggs may increase the risk of foodborne illness.
Hanna, my daughter, was diagnosed with Celiac disease in 2005 at the age of 7. One of the first goals after we
opened our first restaurant was to provide quality, delicious, gluten-free food, and, more importantly, to educate our
staff about what being "gluten-free" really means. We are very proud of what we have created and even more proud
of the staff that stands behind it. Years later, ALL restaurants in our OG Hospitality Group offer great gluten-free
menus. And Hanna, now a bona fide food-diva, has had a hand in all of it. (At least she thinks she does!)
So why gluten-free? We don't do it because the competition is doing it across the street. And we don‚Äôt do it because its
a fad or something we‚Äôre required to do. We do it because we live it everyday and understand all too well the
challenges of going out to eat and finding delicious, healthy gluten-free options.
If you have questions regarding our gluten-free menu or comments or suggestions of things you like or dislike, please
email me at glutenfree@oghgstl.com.
-Brant Baldanza
Owner & Head Dishwasher | OG Hospitality Group

Love your enemy
The mission of Have A Cow is to foster connection and provide opportunity
for folks from different backgrounds to come together, break down cultural
barriers and serve one another.
Growing up kids used to say, ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt have a cow, man!‚Äù meaning don‚Äôt get
all excited about something. But we want you to HAVE A COW! We want
you to get excited! And specifically we want folks to get excited about
getting to know each other, serving each other and even loving each
other - even if we‚Äôre from very different backgrounds - even if we consider
each other enemies.

About the Business
SqWires is proud to be a 5-star certified Green Dining Alliance member. We support local - we buy ingredients & products that are local, organic & responsibly raised. We also recycle, compost & re-purpose. SqWires is proud to support this wonderful historic Lafayette Square neighborhood - we sponsor concerts, movies & annual house tours. SqWires is a St. Louis "EatLocal" member - thank you for supporting independent restaurants.

SqWires is a handsome redesign of a 19th-century brick structure, part of a Victorian-era factory complex. The former Western Wire manufacturing buildings, located on an entire city block in historic Lafayette Square, originally housed the American Bed Factory. In 2001, the complex was totally renovated & converted to house SqWires Restaurant, plus 80 business & residential lofts. The name SqWires combines its location in the Square & history of the Western Wire factory.

SqWires Annex & Front Room are perfect for your next event. Rehearsal dinners, weddings, receptions, holiday parties, business meetings - we would love to help you. Give us a call or email info@sqwires.com.

ALLERGEN INFO
BOGART‚ÄôS GRAB & GO
Take Some Bogart's Home with You!
Our pitmasters have done all the hard work, smoking some of your favorites low and slow for you to enjoy at home! Smoked, vacuum sealed, frozen and ready to travel.
Perfect for St. Louis out of town visitors to grab 'n go at the register on their way back home!
Also great for local barbecue lovers who want to get their Bogart's fix at home when it's convenient for them and their friends and families.

About the Business
Business owner information
Patty P.
Business Owner
Lemp Mansion is fine dining with a comfortable friendly atmosphere featuring the finest French inspired cuisine with tenderloin filets, prime rib, seafood, and pasta. Bananas foster and cherries jubilee prepared tableside for your sweet tooth. Wildly hilarious comedy murder mystery dinner theatre every Friday & Saturday @ 7:00.  Sundays 11:30-8:00 we serve a true family style skillet fried chicken dinner boasting 10 additional sides and it is "All you care to eat".  Lunch is served Monday-Friday, 11:00-2:30.  Classic dishes such as St. Louis' finest club sandwich as well as unique items like the open face prosperity sandwich or the cuban style meatloaf sandwich, also featuring fresh salads and homemade soups.  The Lemp Mansion is an award winning Inn with 6 elegant suites, some even say they are "haunted"  by the Lemp family members who lived and died here in the Mansion.  The Lemp Mansion is your private party destination, we offer the tented patio and gazebo or Lemps Grand Hall.

Sheesh Restaurant is Saint Louis' newest
Turkish restaurant.
 
Come, sit and be mesmerized by wonderful Turkish cuisine such as Pistachio kebabs, Iskender kebabs, stuffed grape leaves, kibbeh and falafel to name a few.
 
Stay longer and enjoy some amazing Apple tea with bakalva or kunafa - a sweet cheese pastry covered in crunchy phyllo and sweet syrup and or course  you must linger to enjoy someTurkish coffee.

About the Business
No Ordinary Rabbit is a neighborhood restaurant serving a menu of shareable plates [family style, not tapas!] inspired by eastern Mediterranean cuisine. We hope to provide a menu that is diverse and fun as well as approachable. Come to The Rabbit with the intent of passing plates around and enjoying bits of everything. A unique wine list pairs wonderfully with the food we serve and there is something for everyone, even if you don‚Äôt know what you want to have. The cocktails are inspired by the food and the region, but aren‚Äôt limited to the ingredients of the Mediterranean. The Rabbit crew is ready to guide you to a joyful experience are excited to answer questions and make suggestions. We just want to deliver the best possible experience with as little pretense as possible. Please, come give us a try!
‚Ä¶

name: City Winery St. Louis
categories: Venues & Event Spaces, Wine Bars, Mediterranean
address: 3730 Foundry Way, Ste 158, St. Louis, MO 63110
raw_text:
City Winery St. Louis | Restaurant & Winery
We thoughtfully pair our world-class wines with delectable, Mediterranean-inspired dishes.
choose your experience
Weekend Brunches
Join us on weekends for brunch from 12PM to 3PM! Enjoy savory classics, sweet bites, and our bottomless mimosas.
Happy Hour
Join us Wednesdays through Fridays 4-6 PM for Half-Priced Wine and Beer on Tap, Plus a Small Bites Menu
Wine Tastings
Enjoy a tasting of our world class varieties and take home a retail bottle or growler from our Wine Shop! Select 'Wine Tastings' when making a reservation.
Winery Experiences
Try one of our offered winery experiences and explore the craft up close
Private Dining
Inquire about our versatile, urban private rooms, perfect for corporate luncheons, romantic date night dinners and more. Enjoy exclusive use of our Private Dining Room for you and your closest friends.

beverages
Craft Beverage (Bubbler) Strawberry Watermelon:
Our Strawberry Watermelon Beverage is bright in color and bold in taste. Now fortified with Vitamin C and Zinc, which may help support a healthy immune system.
Aguas Fresca Horchata:
Aguas Fresca Horchata is the most popular and recognizable flavor of all Aguas Frescas beverages. Rich in flavor and authentic in taste, our Horchata is perfectly balanced between creamy and sweet with delicious accents of cinnamon.
Aguas Fresca Jamaica (Hibiscus):
Aguas Fresca Jamaica (Hibiscus) Jamaica is a fan favorite among Aguas Frescas beverages. Made with real Hibiscus leaves, this tart and refreshing ruby red drink hits your tongue with sweet and delicate floral notes.

beverages
Craft Beverage (Bubbler) Strawberry Watermelon:
Our Strawberry Watermelon Beverage is bright in color and bold in taste. Now fortified with Vitamin C and Zinc, which may help support a healthy immune system.
Aguas Fresca Horchata:
Aguas Fresca Horchata is the most popular and recognizable flavor of all Aguas Frescas beverages. Rich in flavor and authentic in taste, our Horchata is perfectly balanced between creamy and sweet with delicious accents of cinnamon.
Aguas Fresca Jamaica (Hibiscus):
Aguas Fresca Jamaica (Hibiscus) Jamaica is a fan favorite among Aguas Frescas beverages. Made with real Hibiscus leaves, this tart and refreshing ruby red drink hits your tongue with sweet and delicate floral notes.

Our Strawberry Watermelon Beverage is bright in color and bold in taste. Now fortified with Vitamin C and Zinc, which may help support a healthy immune system.
Aguas Fresca Horchata:
Aguas Fresca Horchata is the most popular and recognizable flavor of all Aguas Frescas beverages. Rich in flavor and authentic in taste, our Horchata is perfectly balanced between creamy and sweet with delicious accents of cinnamon.
Aguas Fresca Jamaica (Hibiscus):
Aguas Fresca Jamaica (Hibiscus) Jamaica is a fan favorite among Aguas Frescas beverages. Made with real Hibiscus leaves, this tart and refreshing ruby red drink hits your tongue with sweet and delicate floral notes.

Our Strawberry Watermelon Beverage is bright in color and bold in taste. Now fortified with Vitamin C and Zinc, which may help support a healthy immune system.
Aguas Fresca Horchata:
Aguas Fresca Horchata is the most popular and recognizable flavor of all Aguas Frescas beverages. Rich in flavor and authentic in taste, our Horchata is perfectly balanced between creamy and sweet with delicious accents of cinnamon.
Aguas Fresca Jamaica (Hibiscus):
Aguas Fresca Jamaica (Hibiscus) Jamaica is a fan favorite among Aguas Frescas beverages. Made with real Hibiscus leaves, this tart and refreshing ruby red drink hits your tongue with sweet and delicate floral notes.
Fountain Drinks:
Pepsi, Pepsi Zero, Wild Cherry Pepsi, Mountain Dew, Diet Mountain Dew, Dr. Pepper, Starry, Tropicana Fruit Punch.
Canned Drinks:
Starbucks Mocha(15.2oz), Starbucks Vanilla(15.2oz), Bottled Aquafina Water, Bottled Pepsi (20oz), Bottled Pepsi Zero, Bottled Diet Pepsi, Bottled Mountain Dew, Bottled Diet Mountain Dew, Bottled Starry
Made In House:
Limeade, Organic Black Tea, Organic Green Tea, Organic Tea (Seasonal), Green & White Bergamot Tea, Agua Fresca (Seasonal)

name: Nobu's
raw_text:
Menu
Preheader text
Reservations
Menu
Order To-Go
Events
Our Story
Contact
Coming
Fall
2022
Fall Menu
For centuries, Japanese fisherman of the Tsugaru Strait have known July to January is the best time to catch Bluefin Tuna as schools of the predatory fish migrate to the rough, cold waters in search of squid.
Guided by tradition and sustainable practices, Chef Nobu sources fish from around the world√¢¬Ä¬îfrom the abalone and mussels prized by Chumash Indians off the Central California coast to the Yellowtail of Miyazaki Prefecture in Japan.
Our selections reflect the seasonal rhythms of the sea and field. The freshest seafood is not merely that which as been caught recently, but that which is harvested according to the cycles of the natural world.
Our menu inorporates shin-shoga (fresh ginger from Kochi prefecture, Japan), takenoko (bamboo from Kumamoto, prefecture) and shungiku (Garland Chrysanthemum greens).
RESERVATIONS ARE√Ç¬†currently unavailable. We will open limited seating for soft openings in early October.
Omakase
$160 (six-course dinner)
Experience a classic six-course omakase sushi dinner prepared by Chef Nobu.
√¢¬Ä¬ç
TSUKIDASHI
Chef Nobu will start your experience with ae-mono, nuta, shiro-ae and gomae√¢¬Ä¬îan assortment of traditional items that are a play on various sauces and seasonings presented with vegetables, fish and tofu.
WAN√Ç¬†MONO
Traditional Japanese soup prepared with seasonal ingredients.
SASHIMI
(3-4 pcs)
Chef Nobu will present a seasonal assortment of freshly-sliced raw fish inspired by various traditional Japanese regional favorites including those of his home in Kansai.
IPPIN√Ç¬†MONO
A selection of tempura arrangements, simmered and grilled fish, alongside an assortment of vinegar-based vegetable condiments such as daikon, cucumber, citrus and ginger used as traditional Japanese accompaniments.
NIGIRI, MAKIMONO OR TEMAKI
(11 pcs)
√¢¬Ä¬ç
In Japanese, Nigiri means to squeeze or hold√¢¬Ä¬îin preparing traditional sushi√¢¬Ä¬îto shape sushi with rice in the hand. Chef Nobu prepares an assortment of sushi on rice, temaki and makimono (rolls) in the traditional style.
DESSERT
√¢¬Ä¬ç
Seasonal offering
WINE√Ç¬†&√Ç¬†SAKE PAIRING
(optional addition)
Experience Chef Nobu's selection of sake and wine pairings curated to accompany each course.
*Omakase is prepared chef's-choice based on market and seasonable availability of tuna, salmon, yellowtail, eel, shrimp, salmon roe, mussels, tamago and other ingredients.

Notice: consuming raw or under cooked meat, poultry, fish or eggs may increase the risk of foodborne illness.
Hanna, my daughter, was diagnosed with Celiac disease in 2005 at the age of 7. One of the first goals after we
opened our first restaurant was to provide quality, delicious, gluten-free food, and, more importantly, to educate our
staff about what being "gluten-free" really means. We are very proud of what we have created and even more proud
of the staff that stands behind it. Years later, ALL restaurants in our OG Hospitality Group offer great gluten-free
menus. And Hanna, now a bona fide food-diva, has had a hand in all of it. (At least she thinks she does!)
So why gluten-free? We don't do it because the competition is doing it across the street. And we don‚Äôt do it because its
a fad or something we‚Äôre required to do. We do it because we live it everyday and understand all too well the
challenges of going out to eat and finding delicious, healthy gluten-free options.
If you have questions regarding our gluten-free menu or comments or suggestions of things you like or dislike, please
email me at glutenfree@oghgstl.com.
-Brant Baldanza
Owner & Head Dishwasher | OG Hospitality Group
‚Ñ¢

Cafe Menu
Prepare to be hungry
Our Hawaiian style cafe has a full menu of Hawaiian dishes we rotate through.
Not all dishes listed below are available each day. For an accurate listing of what is on today's menu click the on-line ordering button below.
Order Online
Cafe Menus
Select from a menu category below. Prices are subject to cha
PuPu - Appitizers
Main Dishes
Small Dishes
Side Items
Desserts
Drinks
Breakfast
Menu / Price List
Pupu - Appitizers
A great way to start off your meal, or something to snack on while enjoying a cold cocktail from the tavern.
Lumpia Spring Rolls
3.00
Lumpia is a Filipino version of a fried spring roll that we hand craft. Made in a thin crispy wrapper stuffed with carrots, cabbage, bean sprouts. Each order includes two spring rolls.
These crunchy spring rolls are a nice addition to any plate.
Musubi
3.00
Pronounced moo-sue-bee (with a Hawaiian accent of course) is the ¬†dish that gives Hawaii the reputation for being the SPAM capital of the ¬†world. Musubi consists of a layer of rice sprinkled with Nori Furikake ¬†(rice seasoning), a slice of Teri marinated SPAM grilled to caramelize the marinade, a slice of sweet egg pancake all wrapped in a sheet of Nori (sushi seaweed paper). Sometimes referred to as SPAM sushi, Musubi is eaten like a sandwich perfect for breakfast, lunch or a snack on the ¬†go.
Pork Hash "Shumai"
3.00
Pork Hash Shumai are Chinese dumplings stuffed with ground pork, shrimp and water chestnut. These steamed dumplings are deliciously tasty. They are served as a type of dim sum and include 2 dumplings per order.
Our dumplings are a great addition to a bowl of Saimin soup.
Manapua
4.00
Manapua is a steamed Bao bun filled with Chinese style barbecue-flavored cha siu pork. They are served as a type of dim sum.
Add a footnote if this applies to your business
Main Dishes
Main Dishes
We've put together Hawaii's favorite plate lunch dishes. Locals grind on these delicious entrees at diners throughout the islands. Not all dishes are served daily. We mix them up Bradda.
Teriyaki Chicken Plate
12.00
Dark meat chicken marinated overnight in our own sauce. Then grilled to a sweet savory glaze. This dish is a mild marinade loved by children and ¬†adults. Served with two scoops of white rice and island mac salad.
Teriyaki Steak Plate
13.50
Thinly sliced beef is marinated overnight in our own Hawaiian Teriyaki sauce. It's then nicely grilled bringing out all the flavors of Hawaii. Served with two scoops of white rice and island mac salad.
Kalua Pig Plate
14.50
What is a luau without a Hawaiian smoked pig? Our Kalua pig is slow cooked to a juicy perfection with a touch of saltiness. It's served with cabbage we've sauteed in our house spices. Served with two scoops of white rice and one mac salad.
Loco Moco
15.00
This dish was created at the Lincoln Grill in Hilo on the Big Island to satisfy the hunger of local teenagers after surfing. The dish consists of white rice, topped by a seasoned hamburger patty, a fried egg all smothered in brown gravy.
Add a Slice of Fried SPAM - $1.00
Xtra Hamburger Patty - $2.00
Add Kalua Pork - $3.00
North Shore Garlic Shrimp
13.50
Garlic shrimp has been made famous by the food trucks on the North Shore of Oahu. Our Garlic Shrimp plate will take you away to the North Shore of Oahu.
Poke Plate
15.50
Poke (pronounced poh-kay) means "to cut" in Hawaiian. Poke is a popular ¬†dish where cubed fish is dressed in shoyu based sauce and chilled. It's mixed with Ogo (seaweed) from the North Shore of Oahu, Hawaii, onions and spices. Served with two scoops of white rice and mac salad. So ono!
Kalbi Rib Plate
16.50
Our Korean BBQ ribs are specially cut and marinated overnight in our own blend of spices. Grilled to perfection these ribs are mouth watering. Served with two scoops of rice and island mac salad.
Paniolo Chili Plate
9.50
The first cowboys (Paniolos) to the islands came to the Big Island from California bringing traditional Mexican cowboy grub. Our Paniolo chili is a family recipe using island ingredients such as beef, Portuguese sausage, celery and beans. Served with two scoops of white rice. Mainly served in the Fall/Winter months.
Mochiko Chicken
12.00
A great dish for anyone who enjoys chicken nuggets. 9 Asian fried chicken nuggets. Served with 2 scoops of rice and 1 scoop of Mac salad. ¬†The usual sauce for this dish is Shoyu sauce.
Mixed Plate
14.00
Our Mixed Plate includes your choice of two protein.
Ribs - $3.00
Shrimp - $3.00
Poke - $3.00
Surf Plate
18.00
Our Surf Plate is for the most hungry Bugga. It includes your choice of three proteins and a slice of fried SPAM.
Ribs - $3.00
Shrimp - $3.00
Poke - $3.00
Small Dishes
When you just want a small bite
Add a side item for just a little extra touch.
Teriyaki Steak Sandwich
7.00
Teri Bun is the king of the Hawaiian Drive-in scene. Thinly sliced ¬†beef is marinated overnight in our own Teri sauce. It's then grilled and heaped on a toasted King's Hawaiian Sweet bread bun. Dressed with a swipe of mayonnaise, a slice of Napa cabbage.
Kalua Pork Sandwich
7.00
Our Kalua pig is smoked to juicy perfection. It's then served on a ¬†toasted King's Hawaiian Sweet bread bun topped with our own tangy ¬†Hawaiian slaw and Lilikoi BBQ sauce.
Poke Bowl
10.00
Our Poke bowl includes 1 scoop of our Poke and 1 scoop of rice. ¬†Select between the various Poke options available.
Mochiko Chicken Basket
7.00
6 Asian fried chicken nuggets. White meat chicken in a Mochiko (rice flour) batter.
Paniolo Chili Bowl
6.00
Our Paniolo chili is a family recipe using island ingredients such as beef, Portuguese sausage, celery and beans.
Teri Fries
5.00
Crispy fries with our Teriyaki sauce and Asian mayo drizzle.
Cheese Fries
7.00
Crispy fries with our Cheese sauce and chopped jalape√±os.
Chili Cheese Fries
10.00
Crispy fries with our Paniolo chili, Cheese sauce and chopped jalape√±os.
Loaded Fries
10.00
Crispy fries with Kalua pork, cheese sauce, Lilikoi BBQ sauce and fresh Jalape√±os. A crispy, smokey, & cheesy delight.
Side Items
Add a Hawaiian side to any meal
Hawaiian Mac Salad
1.50
Brought to the islands by the New England missionaries Hawaiian ¬†Macaroni ¬†Salad is affectionately called Mac Salad throughout the ¬†islands. The salad consists of macaroni noodles, mayonnaise, celery, ¬†carrots an seasoning. This simple, yet tasty side dish is a staple ¬†with Hawaiian ¬†plate lunches and picnics. Eat one scoop and you'll be hooked.
Hawaiian Fried Rice
5.00
Our fried rice is traditional Hawaiian style. It includes such yummy¬†treats as Portuguese sausage, fried SPAM, Komoboko, carrots, celery. It's wok fried with ginger, garlic and other yummy ingredients. ¬†Hawaiian Fried rice is not as heavy in Shoyu as other fried rices giving ¬†it a¬†less salty flavor and a more white appearance.
Pineapple Fried Rice
5.00
Our Pineapple Fried Rice is similar to our traditional Hawaiian style without the meat or Komoboko. It makes a great Vegan dish. It includes cilantro, carrots, celery and pineapple for a fresh citrus ¬†flare. It's wok fried with ginger, garlic and other yummy ingredients.
Kimchi Fried Rice
6.00
We take our Hawaiian Fried Rice and add a cup of Kimchi (Korean ¬†fermented Napa cabbage with chili spices) and wok them two together. ¬†Delicious with an egg on top.
Lomi Salmon Salad
3.00
Lomi Salmon is a Hawaiian staple at luaus. It's made from salt ¬†cured salmon, mixed with sweet onions, green onions and diced tomato. We serve it in 3 oz cups to compliment any main dish.
Poke Cup
4.00
Our popular Poke served in a 3 oz cup to compliment any main dish.¬†Select between the various Poke options available.
White Rice
1.50
Our Calrose Botan rice is traditional white short grain sticky rice with Furikake sprinkled on top. It's Non-GMO verified. Add two scoops to any meal.
Dessert
Top off your meal with a tasty dessert
Made in house
Banana Lumpia
3.00
Our fried Lumpia is filled with banana and brown sugar then covered in a coconut caramel drizzle.
Lilikoi Bar
3.00
Lilikoi bars are Hawaii's spin on Lemon bars. Loved throughout the ¬†islands Lilikoi bars are made of Passion fruit curd layered on top of ¬†buttery shortbread and baked to perfection. Real Passion fruit provides a ¬†sweet and tart experience.
Banana Bread Mini Loaf
4.00
Our banana bread is a family recipe loved by all. These mini size ¬†loaves ¬†(5" x 3") are perfect for dessert, snacking or breakfast. We ¬†know you will love them. Made with real Bananas and Walnuts.
Hawaiian Banana Bread Mini Loaf
4.00
Our Hawaiian Banana bread is made with real Bananas, Coconut, ¬†Pineapple and Walnuts. ¬†These mini size loaves (5" x 3") are perfect for ¬†snacking. ¬†We know you will love them.
Chocolate Haupia Pie
6.00
Chocolate Haupia Pie is an island favorite. Our chocolate coconut ¬†pudding pies are 5" pies, perfect for two people to share.
Guava Chiffon Cake
4.00
Guava Chiffon Cake is a favorite in Hawaii and has been called the Queen of the Chiffon Cakes.
Dole Whip Cup
3.00
An 8oz cup of Frozen Pineapple Dole Whip is perfect for children and adults.
Drinks
Featuring Aloha Made
We offer a variety of Hawaiian style juices to compliment our dishes. These juices are imported from Hawaii and are a refreshing treat.
POG - Passion Orange Guava
2.25
Aloha Maid 100% all natural Passion Orange Guava juice. Known in the ¬†islands as POG juice. No Artificial color, No artificial flavor, No ¬†carbonation, 100% DV Vitamin C, 100% Aloha!
Guava Nector
2.25
Aloha Maid 100% all natural Guava juice. No Artificial color, No ¬†artificial flavor, No carbonation, 100% DV Vitamin C, 100% Aloha!
Pineapple Orange
2.25
Aloha Maid 100% all natural Passion Fruit Orange juice. No Artificial ¬†color, No artificial flavor, No carbonation, 100% DV Vitamin C, 100% ¬†Aloha!
Passion Orange
2.25
Aloha Maid 100% all natural Passion Fruit Orange juice. No Artificial ¬†color, No artificial flavor, No carbonation, 100% DV Vitamin C, 100% ¬†Aloha!
Lemon Tea
2.25
Aloha Maid Lemon Tea. No Artificial color, No artificial flavor, No carbonation, 100% DV Vitamin C, 100% Aloha!
Lilikoi
2.25
Aloha Maid 100% all natural Lilikoi/Passion Fruit juice. No Artificial color, No ¬†artificial flavor, No carbonation, 100% DV Vitamin C, 100% Aloha!
Coke / Diet Coke / Sprite
2.00
Add a footnote if this applies to your business
Breakfast / Brunch
Pancakes
Our breakfast menu has some of our favorite dishes and we are sure they will become yours as well.
Banana Pancakes
7.00
Banana ¬†pancakes are such an island treat the North Shore musician Jack ¬†¬†Johnson wrote a song titled after this island favorite. Each bite of ¬†our banana Pancakes will take you away to the Hukilau Cafe in Laie Oahu.
Order includes 2 pancakes
Buttermilk Pancakes
6.00
2 Buttermilk pancakes finished with butter.
Hawaiian French Toast
8.00
French toast made from Portuguese sweet bread. Finished with butter and powdered sugar.
Order includes 2 pieces of French toast
Omelettes & Scrambles
All omelettes & scrambles include Mac salad, rice and toast.
The Hawaiian
12.00
Two eggs as either an Omelette or a Scramble with diced Portuguese sausage, fried SPAM, with diced mushrooms, onion, tomato, bell peppers and cheese.
The Vegetarian
12.00
Two eggs as either an Omelette or a Scramble with diced mushrooms, onion, tomato, bell peppers, broccoli and cheese.
The Tofu Scramble
12.00
Scrambled tofu with diced mushrooms, onion, tomato, bell peppers and broccoli. Includes 2 scoops of white rice, 1 scoop of Mac salad and Hawaiian sweet bread toast. Ask for vegan substitutions.
Breakfast Plates
All plates include 1 egg, Mac salad and toast.
Fried Rice w/ Fried Egg
8.00
A ¬†mound of Hawaiian fried rice with two eggs on top will start your day ¬†off with a smile. Feel free to add additional protein, but it's pretty ¬†filling.
This ono breakfast is how Buzz's starts off many mornings.
Fried Spam w/ Rice & Fried Egg
8.00
Spam Spam Spam Spam Spam Don't knock it until you try it. We ¬†lightly grill slices of SPAM and serve it with white rice and an egg. ¬†NOTE: Locals put ketchup on their breakfast white rice.
Bacon w/ Rice & Fried Egg
10.00
Yummy slices of Bacon with white rice and an egg of your choice.
Portuguese Sausage w/ Rice & Fried Egg
10.00
Portuguese sausage is so popular in Hawaii even mainland chain restaurants have it on the menu. But only in Hawaii. This mildly spicy sausage is perfect with white rice and an egg.
Corned Beef Hash Patty w/ Rice & Fried Egg
13.00
Corned beef & potato are combined into a patty that's grilled and set on white rice. Topped with an egg.
Veggie Hash Patty w/ Rice & Fried Egg
10.00
A vegetable Hash Patty consisting of shredded potato, carrot, parsnips and onion bound with an egg wash. Seared on the flat top and served with white rice, Mac salad and an egg of your choice.
Loco Moco
15.50
This dish was created at the Lincoln Grill in Hilo on the Big ¬†Island to satisfy the hunger of local teenagers after surfing. The dish ¬†consists of white rice, topped by a seasoned hamburger patty, a fried ¬†egg all smothered in brown gravy.
Combo plate
16.00
White rice with 1 slice of fried SPAM, 2 slices of Bacon and 3 slices of Portuguese Sausage and 1 fried egg of your choice.
Hawaiian Food is Ono!
Welcome to Buzz's Hawaiian Grill's menu. Buzz's specializes in authentic
Hawaiian plate lunch
dishes. The plate lunch is quintessentially a modern Hawaiian meal.
Modern day Hawaiians grow up eating
plate lunches
, and if a tourist is lucky enough they will stumble upon a hole-in-the-wall establishment that offers them. Plate lunches were derived from sugarcane and pineapple plantation workers sharing their homeland's food. The plantation workers came to the islands from all over the globe and mostly from China, Japan, Okinawa, Philippines, Portugal, Cuba, and Korea. Another huge influence on the Hawaiian food scene came from the missionaries who traveled from the New England states to bring Christianity and lastly the cowboys from Mexico.
Their homeland recipes were modified to accommodate the available resources of the Hawaiian Islands. These modified recipes created variations of the original dishes making it impossible to obtain their unique flavors outside Hawaii. For instance, there are dishes the Chinese swear are of Japanese heritage, while the same dish is claimed to be Chinese influence by someone from Japan. Bottom line is the dish has become modern day Hawaiian.
Narrowing down which dishes Buzz's should offer was and is a difficult task. What we ultimately elected to do was rotate our menu offering all the dishes our family loves, but at different times. This means not all the ono Hawaiian dishes below are served daily. It also means our daily menu is packed with tasty surprises. ¬†Simply put, not all of our dishes will fit on our truck bradda.
Learn more about Hawaiian Cusine

About the Business
Serving lunch and dinner daily, guests can experience St. Louis' first Korean Fried Chicken, which is double-fried with a special batter that makes the chicken extra crispy. From a spicy Korean Buffalo to a sweet and savory Honey Butter, guests can choose a signature sauce of their choice. Guests can also experience the owner's favorite sauce, the Original, which is a sweet and spicy sauce made from Korean chili peppers. In addition to Korean Fried Chicken, the menu offers both traditional and non-traditional Korean BBQ options. A vegan menu is also available.

th

Come and get it!
Jump To Menu Categories
With a large varied menu,54th Street offers something that everyone will enjoy, including tasty made-from-scratch full-sized appetizers, six salad varieties made with fresh cut produce and housemade dressings, fire-grilled mile high burgers, over nine craft sandwich selections, two delicious housemade soups, comfort favorites and much more.
We also offer quick and flavorsome lunch specials for those who are looking for a fulfilling lunch in a time crunch. If you can't make up your mind on a dish, choose one of our signature menu items and feast on the 'Center Cut' Baby Back Ribs, Chicken Madeira, Filet Mignon, hand cut Certified Angus Beef Ribeye,¬† Blackened Atlantic Salmon, Rattlesnake Pasta and much more. Hint, hint...these are our top of the line menu items you won't wont want to miss!
What sets us apart from your typical casual dining restaurant? Other than our fun atmosphere and cool vibe, we are completely family owned. We DO NOT franchise!
OUR MOTTO
"Great food starts with high quality meats and ingredients, fresh produce and meals prepared from scratch. With our amazing range of quality, scratch prepared menu items, we truly have something for everyone. The Five-Four promise is to forever uphold our tradition of serving generous portions of housemade food and drink at an honest price." Sit back, relax and enjoy the 54 Experience.
All of 54th Street's menu items are listed in the left hand menu so find your favorites and let your mouth start watering!

REINVENTING
Barbecue
EVERY. SINGLE. DAY.
When we first decided to team up to start our barbecue joint in a strip mall, we hesitated a little at the location; wedged between a copy center and a pet store. I mean, where would the smoker go? It turns out, it was the perfect place to launch our BBQ baby that‚Äôs gained fans in St. Louis and awards far beyond. Since 2012, Sugarfire Smokehouse has combined Carolyn‚Äôs incredible desserts and Mike‚Äôs talent for all things smoked and meaty. Now we‚Äôre expanding our reach to share our creations with our favorite cities.
Sincerely,
Chef Mike & Chef Carolyn

Main Plates
the good stuff you're lookin' for
Specialties
Fried Green Tomato Sandwich
fried green tomatoes, cheddar cheese, slaw, carolina mustard bbq drizzle, ranch, on texas toast
Big Muddy
This bad boy of the brisket sandwich world is served with brisket (of course), smoked sausage, horseradish sauce, BBQ sauce, lettuce, pickles. The perfect sandwich for someone who likes a lot of sandwich.
PBLT
The "P" stands for "Pretty Darn Delicious" or "Pimento Cheese." Depends who you ask. Check out the most plentiful BLT you've ever had with pimento cheese, house bacon, lettuce, tomato, on toasted bread.
Brisket Cheesesteak
This is cheesesteak our style. This Philly-inspired sandwich with an east-coast attitude is served with brisket with onions, peppers, and cheese on a hoagie roll.
The Carolina
This simple and sumptuous sandwich is served with a choice of your favorite meat and coleslaw. We top it with a drizzle of our eastern-inspired Mustard Barbecue Sauce for the mid-south tang you're looking for.
Combo Plate
If you're just looking for something simple and straightforward, this is for you. Our specialty barbecue plate with your choice of any 2 smoked meats and 2 sides. This one comes with a fountain soda to wash down with your fav 'cue sauce.
The Meat Daddy
This plate of all plates is not for the faint of heart. Take a look at a 4-bone rib, jalapeno cheddar sausage link, & 4oz each of brisket, pulled pork, turkey. Plus 2 sides and a fountain drink to top it all off. Bone appetit!
3 Meat Combo
This predecessor to the meat daddy is plenty for most. On this one, select 3 of your favorite smoked meats, and add 2 sides and a refreshing fountain beverage. Nap time not included.
Pulled Pork
Pulled Pork Plate
Grab a 6oz. or 8oz. helping of our famous pulled pork and pair it with your two favorite sides and a crisp fountain soda. Top this with with something from our range of sauces for a flavor-balanced meal.
Pulled Pork (Meat Only)
Just looking for a light meal, or maybe even a side dish to be added to your breakfast lunch or dinner? We offer servings of pork by its lonesome in portions of 4oz., 1/2lb., or 1lb.
Pulled Pork Sandwich
Delicious pulled pork on a freshly baked bun. This plate comes with one of your favorite sides. Top with one of our tasty barbecue sauces to round it out.
Brisket
Brisket Plate
Grab a helping of our famous smoked brisket and pair it with your two favorite sides and a crisp fountain soda. Top this with something from our range of sauces for a flavor-balanced meal.
Brisket (Meat Only)
Just looking for a light meal, or maybe even a side dish to be added to your breakfast lunch or dinner? We offer servings of brisket by its lonesome in portions of 4oz., 1/2lb., or 1lb.
Brisket Sandwich
Tasty brisket on a freshly baked bun. This plate comes with one of your favorite sides. Top with one of our tasty barbecue sauces to round it out.
Ribs
Baby Back Ribs (1/2 or Full-Rack)
Grab a 1/2-rack (6-bone) or full-rack (12-bone) helping of our famous house-smoked ribs and pair it with your two favorite sides and a crisp fountain soda. Top this with with something from our range of sauces for a flavor-balanced meal.
Baby Back Ribs (1/3 Rack)
Looking for something lighter? Grab a 1/3-rack (4-bone) of our famous house-smoked ribs and pair it with your favorite side and a crisp fountain soda. Top this with with something from our range of sauces for a flavor-balanced meal.
Sausage
Jalape√±o-Cheddar Sausage
This house recipe of jalape√±o and cheddar mixed straight-up is the perfect pairing for the rest of your meal. Keep a tall glass of cold fountain soda nearby. We didn't hold anything back on this spicy link of all links.
Turkey
Turkey Plate
Grab a 6oz. or 8oz. helping of our famous smoked turkey and pair it with your two favorite sides and a crisp fountain soda. Top this with with something from our range of sauces for a flavor-balanced meal.
Turkey (Meat only)
Just looking for a light meal, or maybe even a side dish to be added to your breakfast lunch or dinner? We offer servings of turkey by its lonesome in portions of 4oz., 1/2lb., or 1lb
Turkey Sandwich
House-smoked turkey on a freshly baked bun. This plate comes with one of your favorite sides. Top with one of our tasty barbecue sauces to round it out.
Burgers
Double Burger
This double-pattied burger is served with one side. Grass fed beef blended daily from our proprietary mix of chuck, brisket and boneless short rib, hand-patted and griddle seared, seasoned only in sea salt and fresh cracked pepper then served on a real butter toasted bun. Add lettuce, tomato, pickles, onions, and house condiments at your request.
Single Burger
This solo-pattied single is grass fed beef blended daily from our proprietary mix of chuck, brisket and boneless short rib, hand-patted and griddle seared, seasoned only in sea salt and fresh cracked pepper then served on a real butter toasted bun. Add lettuce, tomato, pickles, onions, and house condiments at your request.
Salmon
Smoked Salmon Plate
Grab a 5oz. helping of our famous smoked salmon and pair it with your two favorite sides and a crisp fountain soda. Top this with with something from our range of sauces for a flavor-balanced meal.
Smoked Salmon (Salmon Only)
Just looking for a light meal, or maybe even a side dish to be added to your breakfast lunch or dinner? We offer servings of salmon by its lonesome in 5oz portions. This one doesn't come with any sides.
Smoked Salmon Sandwich
We serve smoked salmon in a 5oz. portion on a freshly baked bun. This plate comes with one of your favorite sides. Top with one of our tasty barbecue sauces to round it out.
Fresh Salads
Smoked Turkey Caesar Salad
Our take on this traditional salad is served with romaine lettuce, creamy caesar dressing and topped with a heaping helping of our daily house-smoked turkey, a splash of freshly grated parmesan cheese and house-made croutons.
Chef Salad
This meat-full meal in a salad is brought to you by field greens and topped with brisket, turkey, a hard boiled farm egg, tomato, cucumber, cheddar cheese, red onion, lettuce, ranch dressing or cider vinaigrette.
Starters, Sides, Sauce
before, on the side, or on top
Sauce
White BBQ
Adventurous 'cue eaters will love our Alabama-style white sauce, which gets a kick from just the right amount of horseradish and vinegar. Fantastic on brisket or right out of the bottle. Yum.
Sugarfire 47
There's something special about this sweet, complex sauce. Something indescribable. It's an enigma, just like its name. No one knows what the 47 stands for, not even us.
Honey Badger
In the wild, honey badgers are known for being tenacious. This sweet, tangy sauce will grab you and won't let go until you've poured it over everything in sight.
Coffee BBQ
We love coffee almost as much as we love barbecue. Add a kick to anything with this rich, roasted sauce. Wake up and smell the smoker.
St. Louie Sweet
This perfectly balanced sauce brings just the right amount of sugar to pulled pork, brisket, or a full rack of ribs. Lick your fingers after you're finished. You don't want to leave a drop of this behind.
Carolina Mustard
For folks who like a little more tang in their sauce, our classic Carolina sauce combines yellow mustard and vinegar for a double dose of flavor.
Texas Hot
The temperature is always climbing in the Lone Star State, and so is the heat in this sauce. Our peppery, smooth sauce brings a deep Texas flavor to anything you put it on.
Starters
Fried Green Tomatoes
Juicy, local green tomatoes, fried and sizzling in housemade corn-breading, paired with our special recipe zesty remoulade.
Pork Belly Hush Puppies
This starter or side can be shared or kept to yourself. House-made hushpuppies, breaded and stuffed with pork belly and served with a jalape√±o jelly for dipping. Once you make these part of your Sugarfire schedule, it'll be hard to leave them out.
Sides
House French Fries
This hot, hand-cut potato delight is prepared with love daily. Our french fries are the perfect side to your meat-ful meal. Served in single servings, by the quart (usually for 4-6 people) or by the gallon (usually for 15-20 people).
Baked Beans
This hot, spicy, side is prepared with love daily. Our tangy baked beans are the perfect side to your meat-ful meal. Served in single servings, by the quart (usually for 4-6 people) or by the gallon (usually for 15-20 people).
Coleslaw
This cool cabbage treat is prepared with love daily. Our mayo-based coleslaw is the perfect side to your meat-ful meal. Served in single servings, by the quart (usually for 4-6 people) or by the gallon (usually for 15-20 people).
Potato Salad
This cool potato treat is prepared with love daily. Our mayo-based potato salad is the perfect side to your meat-ful meal. Served in single servings, by the quart (usually for 4-6 people) or by the gallon (usually for 15-20 people).
Desserts
from chef/partner, Carolyn Downs
Pies and Cookies
Smoked Chocolate Chip Cookie
You are in for a treat, ma' friend. These freshly baked and smoked chocolate chip cookies are topped with just a bit of salt to set your tastebuds goin' nuts as you wrap up your favorite meal of the day.
Housemade Pies
Hand-crafted by the pie shop team led by our pastry chef and partner, Carolyn Downs, pies at Sugarfire are seriously housemade. Our pies and pastries are crafted with recipes that have been perfected over many years and are the perfect pairing to the "fire" side of Sugarfire.
Shakes & Bevs
pop & fizz & pop & fizz &
Shakes & Floats
Ice Cream Soda Floats
Scoops of local, handmade ice cream in a glass, topped with local soda, or "pop" if that's where you are. These floaty delights are served in varieties of purple cow, root beer, or orange. Or, just ask us for some ice cream and top it with your favorite soft drink!
Pie Shakes
It might just be exactly what it sounds like. A full piece of pie blended directly into one of our housemade milk shakes. Choose your pie and choose your shake flavor and see them come together in holy moo-trimony right in front of your eyes.
Housemade Milk Shakes
Choose your favorite classic flavor from our selection of chocolate, vanilla, or strawberry. Topped with whipped cream and other fun stuff! Our housemade shakes are always made with fresh ice cream. Brain freeze insurance not necessarily included.
Soda Pop &...
Adult Shakes
These grown-up shakes are for our 21 and up crowd only, and they are the perfect cool pairing to your smoky, sweet, or spicy meal. Served in varieties of chocolate peanut butter bourbon, white russian, or vanilla caramel bourbon. You've earned it.
Micro & Macro Beer
Pair your favorite delicious barbecue meal with a local or macro brew of your choice. Check out your local Sugarfire for a current list of frosty brews! Beers are for dining in only. Thanks to our brewery partners for providing these crispy 'cue-quenchers.
Soda Pop & Tea
We take pride in sourcing local soda pop and also offer a selection of sweetened and unsweetened iced tea. Thanks to our local partners for being a part of our dining experience in each and every Sugarfire city. Cheers to you!

our chef creations

why risk it? go with brisket.

Korean food & desserts & drinks

Croffles - A mix of Croissants and waffle. It requires Preheating/baking/cooling to get a nice crispy texture outside and also not too hot for house made cream to nicely sit on it. Please bear with us if we are in process of making fresh croffles. 

Gimbap burrito - Korean beef/spicy tuna/spam/shiitake mushrooms in a seaweed rice roll. 

Bing su - Popular Korean dessert aka shaved milk flakes

The Best Food in St. Louis
Eclipse Restaurant
menus are updated seasonally with fresh, creative offerings. We experiment with exciting new flavors and the freshest ingredients¬†in order to craft the best food in St. Louis.
In the Eclipse Restaurant and lounge, enjoy American gastro cuisine with a cosmic twist. The restaurant‚Äôs stylish interior provides a contemporary yet intimate space in which to dine on the finest fare in the galaxy.
For stellar small plates¬†or appetizers and creative, hand-crafted cocktails and drinks, jet up to the seasonal
Rooftop Garden Bar
and all-seasons
Twilight Room
. Sip and savor under the world‚Äôs largest man-made moon on our open-air patio. Or, relax inside an out-of-this-world atmosphere in the Twilight Room.
No matter which space you choose you‚Äôre certain to enjoy an unmatched dining experience in unique surroundings
The Extraordinary Moonrise Menus
Menus are regularly updated with seasonal offerings, so there‚Äôs always something new to come back and try! We innovate¬†while¬†still respecting the classics.

About the Business
We invite you to sample our full multi-culturally influenced menu, with a focus on appetizers for sharing. Our kitchen is open from 11 am until 9 pm Monday thru Thursday, and 11 am until 10 pm on Friday.  Saturday we have brunch from 10 am-1 pm & the regular menu until 10 pm.  On Sunday we open for brunch from 10 am-2 pm and the kitchen remains open until 8 pm.  Don't forget to ask about our house-made desserts!

Visit The Grove Bierhall
Urban Chestnut's second facility, the Grove Brewery &√Ç¬†Bierhall (formerly a paper company built in the 1920's), opened in February 2014. Located in St. Louis' Grove neighborhood, we utilize this brewery as the source of most of our beer production and packaging. With seating for over 400, the Bierhall is the perfect spot to host a gathering, celebrate a special occassion, or catch up with friends and family.
√¢¬Ä¬ç
Our Grove Bierhall kitchen is ran by our friends at Niche Food Group, as Fordo's Killer Pizza!√Ç

We offer tours of our Grove Bierhall on Saturdays at 12:30pm. Tours are limited to 16 people and include a beer!
